story:
[Note: BionicGym is FDA-cleared but this is a training / exercise product not intended for medical or rehabilitation purposes]

"Fight the fat while watching TV"

 

 

BIONICGYM IS AVAILABLE IN TWO MODELS

AT HIGH LEVELS IT IS REASSURINGLY TOUGH. AT EASY LEVELS IT IS DECEPTIVELY EASY.

Work at whatever pace suits you. Use it at low levels working, say the equivalent of walking.  Best at a standing desk.  Obviously, as you increase the intensity you sweat and it becomes harder and then impractical to work.  At higher intensities people play video games or watch tv.  It’s tough, yes but you know you're training hard.  

Dr Xand of Channel 4: "I'm actually pretty impressed with the results"

 

 

THE SCIENCE-Y BIT BEHIND THE PRODUCT

Nature’s way of creating heat or burning calories is to shiver.  As you get colder you shiver more intensely but at the same rate (7-8Hz).  This is because the energy consumption is not related to the force or tension generated but rather the shortening and lengthening of the muscle fibers.  What happens is that more muscle fibers contract and relax at this magic rate for maximal calorie burn per muscle fiber. 
 
Impulses through the BionicGym Wraps stimulate the motor-neurons [nerves-to muscles] in the legs and glutei [bum] telling them to contract repeatedly.  (They relax or lengthen by themselves).  If enough muscle is actively contracting at optimal rates they will shout out for blood to supply the oxygen and energy.  Your cardiovascular system [heart and blood vessels] works harder to deliver this blood, i.e. it trains.  You’ll become more breathless and in time heat up – even sweat… after all it is nature’s way to warm up. Crazy right?

BionicGym has been subject to numerous scientific studies and published in indexed, peer-reviewed journal.  The technology has been supported by European Space Agency, Enterprise Ireland, Bio-Medical Research Ltd, Hull University (UK), and University College Dublin (Ireland).   

 

 

 

Dr. Louis Crowe.  A medical doctor and innovator.  His inventions have had more than a billion dollars worth of sales, used by millions of people and cleared by the FDA.  Worked with Biotronik's medical think tank in Berlin.

Tuoyo Memuduaghan. Dubliner and world traveler. Gifted athlete, entrepreneur and advocate for social change.  A top digital marketing strategist for some of Fortune’s top 100 companies, Tuoyo is now on a mission to create innovations in health and fitness for people worldwide.

 

 

TIMELINE

In the Spring of 2000, Louis got into the cold Atlantic Ocean so that he could observe the movement of shivering. He realised that as he got colder he didn't shiver faster, but in fact, more and more of him shivered at the same rate (~7-8Hz) until even his teeth were chattering. And more importantly, nature's way to burn calories without moving was not dependent on generating muscle tension or moving the joints.  

Since then, the technology has been through many iterations, improving all the time. We've developed it and researched it with companies (special thanks to BMR Ltd) with University College Dublin and hospitals in Ireland and UK.  

In 2019 we got FDA clearance and started shipping.  (Users doing great and loving it!).  

We believe BionicGym will help many millions be fitter, healthier and happier. However, we can only take the next step to design this for mass manufacture with your support.  

Lastly, thank you for your time. With your help we will deliver this product, helping people be fitter, healthier and perhaps even happier!  Please share and if you can pledge, please do.

**Those with any medical condition or at high risk should consult with a doctor before starting any exercise program (including BionicGym).  Exercise is absolutely necessary for your health but before embarking on any vigorous exercise program men  >45 years and women >55 years, all smokers or anyone with any serious medical condition /risk factor (e.g. diabetes) should first consult with their doctor or physician.

story:
Tot on the Pot is an all-inclusive, play-based potty training system that provides parents and kids with everything they need to dump the diaper in a fun, engaging and healthy way.

We're here to help parents tackle one of the most challenging developmental milestones their toddler will face: Potty Training. Research has shown that the anxiety parents have towards potty training can delay and complicate the training process, and even negatively impact a child’s development. Research has also shown that play-based learning is one of the most effective teaching tools in early childhood.

 

By providing a complete, all-inclusive solution, we take the load off parents. We provide everything they need to become informed, empowered potty trainers. We also engage the tremendous power of play to speak to toddlers in the language they best understand. This encourages a successful potty training process and it gives parents and kids an opportunity to have *FUN* while learning valuable lessons.

 

 

 

All-Inclusive

Parents who begin to prepare for potty training are often overwhelmed with the amount of reading, guesswork and half-baked solutions that await them. 

Tot on the Pot is entirely unique in that it handles all three components of Potty Training:

Parents and their toddlers are given every piece of the potty training puzzle. When combined, these pieces form a complete solution that eliminates doubts and delivers results.

Pediatrician Recommended

Pediatricians have long been a trusted voice when potty training panic sets in. They have answered every potty training question, heard about every new approach and consoled every frustrated parent...so their input was essential for us!

We are proud to have received endorsements from multiple pediatricians and other early childhood specialists. We trust our pediatricians to take care of our children...and our pediatricians trust Tot on the Pot to potty train them in a healthy way.

Play-Based

During potty training age, your toddler's attention spans range from 3-8 minutes...and that's when they're actually interested in what they're doing! Encouraging a child to drop their toys to sit on a potty for what may seem like hours is every parent's biggest challenge and worst nightmare.

Tot on the Pot was designed specifically to overcome this obstacle by engaging children in play-based potty training. Potty training doesn't have to be a chore. It can actually be FUN!

Cognitive Benefits

Children in their toddler and pre-school years benefit from an almost limitless capacity to learn and acquire new skills. Exposing children in this age group to mental and cognitive stimulation benefits them in a big way and has the potential to accelerate their learning capabilities as they grow.

That is why we made sure that every one of our activities includes valuable cognitive benefits that expand your child's mind and thought processes.

Everybody Poops

Potty Training is a process that every child goes through. Kids with developmental delays sometimes require a little extra patience and understanding as they navigate the challenging path to potty independence. 

For these children and their parents, we included 'Some Extra Love' tips throughout our Parent's Guide. These segments modify the potty training process to support the unique needs of children who are developmentally delayed. They further highlight elements of the Tot on the Pot system that are especially conducive to helping kids who need an extra hand.

Everybody Poops...so Tot on the Pot was made for everybody.

 

Every Tot on the Pot Comes With:

  • Parent's Guide to Potty Training
  • Tot on the Pot Children's Book
  • Tot Doll
  • The Pot - The Tot's Potty
  • 20 Activity Reward Cards

#1: Parent's Guide to Potty Training

No more late nights scouring the web looking for tips. No more 150+ page potty training books. Our Parent's Guide to Potty Training is a concise, step-by-step guide that combines the most effective potty training methods with the best tips and tricks. We know our crap. And now you will too.

#2: Tot on the Pot Children's Book

A fun, whimsical narrative that informs your toddler and gets them excited to use the potty. This colorful board book will not only get them on the potty, but it will also entertain them while they wait for that glorious splash/plop.

#3: The Tot

The Tot is your child's very own partner in poop during potty training and beyond. The Tot comes in both genders, as well as light and dark skin tones, to give your toddler a true partner they can identify with. The Tot acts as a great reminder to use the potty and keeps your child company during every visit to the bathroom.

#4: The Pot

The Pot is the Tot's own potty, ensuring that the Tot and your child truly visit the bathroom together. The Tot also acts as the reward center for every successful potty visit.

#5: Activity Reward Cards

Instead of defaulting to candy or bribes, your toddler's successful potty visit is rewarded with a surprise activity they get to perform with their parent. These super fun activities require no preparation and engage your child's imagination to provide valuable cognitive benefits as they celebrate their achievement.

 

 

This is us...moments before we launched our crowdfunding campaign!! Thanks for getting this far. We appreciate it!!

Hello there! We’re Jackie and Elliot, two parents whose love for kids and family, combined with a passion to create fun and meaningful activities, drives us forward every single day.  

Even though we’re at different stages of parenthood (Elliot’s daughter just started walking and Jackie’s daughter just walked down the aisle), we know that raising kids can be as challenging as it is fulfilling. We joined together to provide moms and dads with solutions to make the harder parts of parenting easier…with a healthy dose of *fun* too! 

We’re so excited to share our first endeavor with you: Tot on the Pot. We started with potty training because we were OVERWHELMED with feedback from parents about how much they dread it. So in an effort to help moms and dads enjoy every minute with their kids (even the crappy ones), we spent years crafting the perfect play based solution that would actually make kids want to embrace the potty. We went one step further and added in a Parent’s Guide and a Children’s Book to save parents money, time and mistakes by doing things the right way the first time. Then we went even one step further and crafted reward activities that would enhance and advance your child’s development. 

And now, we’re happy to share years of potty training expertise and creativity with you. We want nothing more than for you to enjoy Tot on the Pot with your kids while teaching them valuable lessons along the way.

We realized we had a real opportunity to positively impact parenting...and so we did.

story:
Who Are We? 

We are a small team of designers and engineers with a mission: to share Sola Egg to the world.  We truly believe our revolutionary design will add a little extra happiness into your life! 

“We want to improve people’s lives!”

Sola is a brand several years in the making. We are passionate about delivering a lifestyle product that is unique; a device tailored to fit your health and personal needs.

Through design and technology, we have come up with a new product that we believe will enhance relationships, encourages communication and fortifies intimacy. We want to share our story with you.  The Sola Collection is easy to use and is made from the highest quality materials available. Sola Egg was created to help men and women everywhere achieve new depths of relaxation and  well-being.

Brought to you by Team Sola 


Where We Are At: 

The technology is developed, the design is done and the manufacturing is secured! We have handmade a couple of working prototypes that are fully functional. We have made improvements to the design of our magnetic charging dock. This dock is elegant, sleek and meets our high quality standards. We have invested our time, money and efforts to make this a possibility. All we need is you! Your feedback and support will help us make Sola Egg and Sola lifestyle products the best on the market. 

We believe the Sola Egg Sexual WellnessMassager is a fantastic lifestyle product that will make you and your partner happier. We're here to prove that Sola Egg Massager that a vibrator can also be a massager that does not need to be hidden away in shame.  By reaching out on Indiegogo, we can assess our demand, build a strong connection with our contributors and backers like you, and use your feedback to make Sola Egg Massager an amazing product.


Use of Funding

We have already invested much more than what we are looking to raise.  We have created the design and developed a prototype and packaging.

By joining our campaign, we will use the funds to increase our marketing efforts and to pay for immediate manufacturing upfront costs so we can deliver the finished product in time for our early adopters for Valentine's Day.

With your feedback, we will continue to improve our design and ideas to better enhance our product and to satisfy your every needs. Your support and contribution means the world to us! 

You can help us mold Sola into the ultimate lifestyle brand and reach our goal of improving "personal" wellness and heighten intimacy. A better "personal" life leads to a healthier you.  So please join us!


Support Us

You can support us by making your contribution now! 

You can also follow us on 

Twitter  https://twitter.com/MeetSola

Facebook  www.facebook.com/meetsola 

Instagram  https://www.instagram.com/meetsola. 

 


Q&A


Q: Is Sola a vibrator or a body Massager?  

A:  First and foremost, Sola Egg is a vibrator but can also be used as a body massager. You can use Passion Sleeves to enhance your sexual wellbeing, or you can use the Wellness Sleeves on the rest of your body. 

Q: Can Sola be used as massager on neck and shoulders?  

A: Yes. Use either of the Wellness Sleeves to alleviate back, shoulder and neck pain.

Q: What color's do the Sola Egg Massager come in?

A: Sola Egg Massager was designed with 4 silicone attachments in 4 different colors: burgundy, slate blue, pale pink and seafoam green. These attachments are interchangeable and can be used as often as you like.

Q: Is Sola body safe?  

A: Yes. All Sola products are body safe and phthalate free. Our premium silicone is non-porous, easily washable, and hypoallergenic.  

Q: Is Sola waterproof?  

A: Yes! Sola is waterproof. Use Sola in the tub, shower, even pool side!

Q: Can I use Sola if I travel to Europe or Asia?  

A: Yes. Sola comes with a magnetic charging dock that uses universal USB/AC adaptor, which means that it works worldwide and there is no need for a voltage converter. Plug the USB charger into your laptop, computer or anywhere USB compatible. Use the AC adaptor to charge Sola Egg in any wall outlet. 

Q: How long does Sola take to charge?  

A: Sola fully recharges within 3 hours.  Once fully charged, you will have up to 1.5 hours of play! 

Q: Does Sola have a warranty?

A: We offer a 5 year warranty with our Sola products. This 5 Year warranty covers your product from any defects.  Save the packaging! This serves as your proof of purchase. If product fails we will repair or replace the item at our discretion. Misuse, improper storage or attempted repair to the product voids this warranty.

Q: Will Sola be shipped free?  

A: Yes, We will ship Sola free of charge as our gift to you as long as you provide us with a valid US address.  

Q:  Will Early Bird Special Set be delivered before Valentine's Day?  

A: Yes. We expect to send it to our early adopters right before Valentine's Day.

story:
A smart interactive table tennis trainer for all level players

Fastpong turns table tennis into even more exciting games while helping anyone from beginners to professionals to discover and improve their weaknesses with the help of AI-based performance tracking system. Become an expert much faster while having fun by yourself or with friends.

 

Are you that one clumsy person who accidentally kicks furniture?

Do you always lose to your friends in sports?

Are you worried that your family may develop dementia?

Playing table tennis on a daily basis is proven to improve your decision-making skills, accuracy, and brain health.

 

 

 

                                                                   

 

Hit the grid that lights up. The light will disappear in a split of a second and reappear on another grid.

 

Fastpong cheers you up along the way, so you won’t ever get bored even if you’re playing alone with a ball server. Here are some games and moods you can choose to motivate yourself and having fun while playing.

  • Sponge Bob sound effect
  • Tekken sound effect
  • Statistic feedback like Siri
  • Many more....

 

You can easily pack Fastpong by folding it.

 

Fold it, bring it anywhere, and simply unfold on any table.

 

Every human has an error but Fastpong’s sensors can find where exactly your weakness is. By detecting where the ball is coming at you and where in ping pong table you cannot send the ball to as well as your ball speed, the application allows you to:

  • Compare your results with your friends to see who’s better.
  • Find out your weaknesses
  • Design your own training program on the app or device to improve your weaknesses

Fastpong software is AI-powered and through machine learning, it analyzes your strengths and weaknesses and will create a customized training program for you.

Our data analysis system follows up your performance accuracy data and your ball speed data while you are training. With a special algorithm, it analyzes your game and it provides you the best training program as well as tells you how much time you need to train to achieve your goals, according to your improvement.

 

 

The app not only analyzes your performance but also lets you record it. Checking your own posture allows you to reflect from a whole new perspective.

 

 

Now that you’ve collected the data and recordings on your performance, you can share them with your coaches. No matter how far away they are, your coaches will be able to receive the data and provide you with feedback.

 

 

Based on the data and the video of yourself collected on the app, you can start designing your own training program. Simply choose one exercise to target your biggest weakness or mix different exercises to simulate actual table tennis games.

FastPong graphs enable users to see all the details about their weakness and strength and also compare their improvement with each other as well as see their progress. It can be tool for coaches to show their students about their progress.

 

 

 

Play alone to master your weaknesses, then show off your skills and beat your family, coworkers, and friends.

 

 

FastPong enables you to create your specific game strategies based on your opponent’s weakness or your tactics. By training to limit the available time to change the direction of sending ball into a different specific area in response to different visual stimuli, Fastpong can improve your reaction time and accuracy.

A scientific research proved that using Fastpong was more efficient than using a ball throwing machine. Within six weeks, intermediate level players who trained with Fastpong had better improvement rates than players who trained with a ball throwing machine.

In this research, 18 players trained for 20 minutes, 3 times a week.

After using Fastpong for 6 weeks, their accuracy rate doubled and their choice reaction time improved by 16 percent.

Source: https://bit.ly/37rNLEa  

 

 

Our story starts when I was a national table tennis player and I was always wondering how can I improve my skills. Not until I was a sports science researcher, I came out with a theory with my professor about the reason why reaction time and decision making of athletes improve. In order to test that theory, we needed to create a device to test our theory that we found out it can actually help athletes to improve in a very short time. And now that device transformed to FastPong.

A working prototype has been developed, tested and is going through rigorous testing in various scenarios and environments.

In order to start manufacturing and bring the product to you, Fastpong needs the support of the crowdfunding community. It will help us and our investors to, first of all, be sure that table tennis player willing to purchase Fastpong as well as cover the cost making molds for the manufacturing and turning the prototype into a manufacturable product. The funds gathered here will go into turning the prototype into a real product.

 

"I PLAY EACH POINT LIKE MY LIFE DEPENDS ON IT"

By purchasing FastPong T-shirt for 30$ you will receive a 20% off coupon (~120$) for the next FastPong device crowdfunding campaign. 

Fastpong is a revolutionary sport device that everyone or anyone can enjoy. We are not just building a product, we are building a vision that fits anyone in the sport industry.

We have made our MVP so far and now we are finalizing the manufacturing settings and also the design of the mold. In this campaign, FastPong would be familiar with crowdfunding and its logistic difficulties to be ready for the main campaign to offer fastpong device in March. 

We need your support now.

 

 

 

 

Manufacturing FastPong in very large quantities may become more challenging, however, we have been continuously working with manufacturers and other parties involved to make sure we can increase the production number rapidly, after our campaign. FastPong sensors require sophisticated mounting and we have to make sure as the production number increases the quality of the mounting does not drop. We have communicated this with our manufacturers to make sure they are aware of the difficulties ahead of time and prepare for high volume production. Since FastPong is a relatively large device, we may face challenges with shipping and packaging. We have been in touch with experts in the field to make sure we reduce the risk as much as possible, but due to various rules and regulations in each country, this may become more challenging for some countries and the shipping date may be delayed. Having said that, at FastPong we will try our very best to make sure you receive your beloved product in time.

 

Share With Friends and Family

story:
I WOULD LIKE TO TAKE THE TIME TO EXPRESS MY THANKS TO ALL
I WAS BORN AND RAISED CATHOLIC AND WHEN IT COMES TO
SOME THINGS PERSONAL IT IS HARD FOR ME TO EXPRESS THAT THAT IS
WHY I TEND TO MAKE A JOKE ABOUT EVERYTHING .THE THING IS I
THOUGHT THAT DONNA AND I WERE THE ONLY PEOPLE IN LOUISVILLE
THAT KNEW ABOUT MICHAELS DISEASE DONNA DID NOT EVEN REALIZE
SHE HAD IT UNTIL SHE WAS 14 WEEKS ALONG WITH MICHAEL
AND FOR THE LAST 18 YRS WE HAVE BEEN MARRIED I SWORE
THAT I WOULD TRY TO FIND OUT AS MUCH AS I COULD ABOUT IT
SO MICHAEL IS 15 WE DID NOT KNOW IT COULD GET THIS BAD THIS QUICK
AND IT DID BUT THE HUNDREDS OF TUMORS IN HIM,ARE NOT CARSONOGENIC
CANCER, AND NOT MALIGANT-BUT THEY ARE BENIGN-THE MAJOR ONE IS BETWEEN
T1 AND T6 THE SIZE OF A ZIPPO LITER WRAPPED AROUND THE MAJOR BRACHIAL NERVE
IN YOUR LEFT ARM AND IS COMPRESSED CREATING NERVE DAMAGE DUE TO HIS DISEASE.
BUT I WOULD LIKE TO TAKE THE TIME TO TALK AS A FATHER,BROTHER,PARISHNOR,
HUSBAND- YOU PRAY AND PRAY FOR GOD TO HELP YOU THROUGH THIS TRYING TIME
BUT THAT IS WHEN YOU REALIZE WHAT THE TYPE OF COMMUNITY YOU LIVE IN
FAMILY IS A TERM THAT IS THROWN AROUND ALOT FAMILY TO ME IS ANYONE OR ANY
COMMUNITY THAT SAYS WHAT CAN I DO -HOW CAN I HELP YOU-I CONSIDER THIS FAMILY
SOMEONE SAYING HOWS MIKE-ARE YOU ALRIGHT DON'T WORRY I WILL PRAY-WE WILL PRAY
THE CHURCH WILL PRAY FOR YOU-FAMILY DOES NOT MEAN BLOOD RELATIVES FAMILY TO ME
IS ANYONE THAT YOU CAN RELY ON ONCE YOU REALIZE WHO THAT IS AND HOW MANY FAMILIES
LOVE YOU AND YOUR CHILDREN.YOU CAN PUT A PRICE ON THAT THEN YOU REALIZE THAT IT
IS JUST NOT DONNA AND I AND MICHAEL AND ELIZABETH IT IS THE CHURCH GAIL
ST.JAMES,TRINITY HIGH SCHOOL MR SCHMITT EVERYONE TOMMY AND SALLY CLEMONS
-BOB AND BETH MONTGOMERY-ANGELA JONES-MR AND MRS HUNTINGTON AND DEBBIE FRIENDS OF DON AND ANNE FIELDEN THESE FAMILIES AND
IS WHAT I CONSIDER MY FAMILY BLOOD HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH IT-THEY SAY IT TAKES
A FAMILY TO RAISE A CHILD I THINK MANY FAMILIES TOO RAISE A COMMUNITY I LIVE AND LOVE
THE COMMUNITY I AM IN- IT HAS TAKEN ME ALMOST 40YRS TO REALIZE THAT DONNA AND I ARE
EXTREMELY LOVED AND EVERYONE HAS HAD US IN THERE PRAYERS.MUCH LOVE TO EVERYONE
AND EVERYONE I HAVE MENTIONED IS FAMILY!
but lately since i am disabled there is not enough money to go around and donna and i are willing to let our amenties go so the kids don't suffer but they would never mention it like there friends going out of town it upsets me that we cannot even go to the lake on a day outting cause he needs his pain meds can't take them with us you get pulled liable to go to jail ,my wife was driving thru one of our parks and a dog ran out in front of her she crashed we have full coverage do i pay for it or loose apartment or pay apartment and never get car out plus the car payment it is causing me to stress out my seizures are geting worse i just need a little help i am willing to set down and explain his disease and wifes disease just need a little help and passport health does not pay for everthing so that cuts into my cash on hand money i need help !
SINCRELY
JACK AND DONNA MOORE

story:
Why should professional athletes be the only ones to receive professional-level massages?

We all feel pain, right?

The Prosage Thermo massage gun brings you deep muscle release by combining percussion and Theralite heating to release tension and pain, activate muscles, and improve recovery. 

 

 Prosage Thermo is designed for professionals but made for you to use at your own convenience. Going to a professional massage therapist is expensive and takes up valuable time. With the Prosage Thermo you have your own personal massager at hand whenever you need it.

 

The Prosage Thermo features 5 different massage heads to precisely fit your needs. Each head is specially designed to alleviate different types of pressures all over your body.

 

 Cory Group are an Award Winning Crowdfunding Agency - For more info: corygroup.co

 

 

DISCLAIMERS

“These statements have not been evaluated by the food and drug administration. This product is not intended to treat, cure, or prevent any disease”.

The information, including but not limited to texts, graphics, images and other material contained on this website is for educational purposes only. The content is not intended in any way as a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health care provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition or treatment and before undertaking a new health care regime, and never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because something you have read on this website.

Evertone, Inc does not guarantee specific results for individuals who use the Prosage Thermo System due to many factors that can influence health and or weight loss.

Individual results may vary.

The Prosage Thermo is not a weight loss system

We make no warranties or guarantees that you will lose a specific amount of weight for a particular period of time.

No individual results should be considered typical or guaranteed.

story:
Our Story

We are champions of women's rights making a push for safety when lone women interact with police officers. Sexual assault by officers at traffic stops is an estimated at least 60 incidents per year (I).  Police misconduct has unfortunately increased 25% since 9/11 (II).

My fiancee and I personally got involved with this issue after I pulled over at what looked like an open store while driving alone past midnight on the Pacific Coast Highway. The sheriff said my headlight was out, and walked away silently leaving a $500 additional citation on my ticket citing I had "failed to yield" because I sought to pull over in a lit, populated area. I chose to pull over near a store for safety, having read numerous articles of officers sexually assaulting women at traffic stops. My rights were violated when I was fined $500 for doing something reasonable to protect myself. I was suspicious upon seeing the patrol car drive alongside me to peer inside my vehicle, when I was going the speed limit. This suspicion was combined with my previous encounter with a New Jersey police department whose chief was fired for promoting prostitution. As long as there are incidents of police misconduct with lone females, it is our right to take reasonable means to protect ourselves. 

My fiancee and I spoke numerous times to the Malibu City Council about this incident. We learned how in September 2009 Mitrice Richardson, after witnesses at a restaurant said she exhibited signs of mental health instability, was detained then released from the Malibu/Lost Hills sheriff station at 1:25AM, alone, without money or a cell phone. After release Mitrice fell victim to an unknown attacker and her remains were found less than three miles from the station. 

Incidents like these clearly demonstrate the need for greater understanding and regard for women's safety by law enforcement. Law enforcement should take into account that women are targeted for rape and often their best defense is to not be alone in desolate areas. It is unacceptable that lone female drivers under non-emergency situations are cited $500 tickets for stopping in populated areas instead of desolate stretches of highway at night.

What my fiancee and I accomplished so far, by speaking up, was to have the Malibu/Lost Hills sheriff protocols reviewed at a Malibu Public Safety Commission meeting. Some of Mitrice's family and/or friends attended the meeting and spoke about their concerns as well. The sheriff department's position was that, the city Public Safety Commission did not have power to change their protocols, and could only make recommendations. Upon hearing how women's purses were sometimes locked away with impounded vehicles, and women detained would be released without cell phones or money at night, the Commission voted 3 to 1 in favor of recommending sheriff protocol improvements to ensure essentials like money and cell phones are provided to released detainees, even if those items are kept in purses.

This was a small but significant step by the city, with no guarantee the recommendation will be followed. We are asking donors to help compensate our time and further our ability to fight for safety rights. Our actions for public safety were done at our own expense, to the point we are broke and cannot continue putting in time without support.

Please also sign our petition:
a. http://thepetitionsite.com/6/law-enforcement-pr...

Monique Lukens
Josef Dochterman


Lukens noted in the following articles:

(1)  http://malibusurfsidenews.

(2) (last paragraph) http://

(3)  http://malibusurfsidenews.

(4) http://malibu.patch.com/

(5) http://malibutimes.com/

(6) http://malibusurfsidenews.com/


Lukens and Dochterman heard speaking on the following links:

(1) Feb. 28th: (video gives easy forwarding access to see Lukens at about 1 hr. 7 min. into the video) http://malibu.granicus. 
(Meeting Minutes http://www.malibucity.)

(2) May 23rd: (video gives easy forwarding access to see Lukens at about 26 min. into the video) http://malibu.granicus.
(Meeting Minutes http://www.malibucity.)

(3) June 27th: (video gives easy forwarding access to see Lukens and Josef Dochterman 2 min. into the video) http://malibu.granicus.

(4) July 25th: (video gives easy forwarding access to see Lukens and Josef Dochterman 5 min. into the video) http://malibu.granicus. 

(5) August 8th: (video gives easy forwarding access to see Lukens and Josef Dochterman 6 1/2 min. into the video) http://malibu.granicus.

(6) August 22nd: (video gives easy forwarding access to see Lukens and Josef Dochterman 6 1/2 min. into the video, and then the Mayor and Councilperson Jefferson Wagner makes comments to me 22 min - 24 1/2 min. into the video)
http://malibu.granicus..

The Impact

This is a local (Lost Hills / Malibu Sheriff Dpt.), State, AND National Issue.


Please watch the videos on these 2 links:

http://youtube.com/watch?v=ibSwITK4jjQ

http:// 

These videos show women being restrained for pulling their cars over in populated areas to keep themselves safe during traffic stops.  One of the women had on her hazards.

Each woman are each from separate states.  It's really important women all over the nation may safely pull over in a populated, open public, lit area without fearing heavy financial penalty (as I was in Malibu, CA), being pulled out of the car, being restrained on the ground, and/or being handcuffed as in seen in the above cases.   

According to The National Police Misconduct Statistics and Reporting Project's Quarterly Q1 Report (Look here http:// ), police are accused 3 times more than the rest of the population for sexual assaults on women.

There are enough stories on a weekly basis of real and fake law enforcers raping women.  Many of these are at traffic stops.  Without a national protection in place, situations like these will continue to happen making women vulnerable to sexual assault, bodily and emotional trauma, and/or financially penalties. 


What We Need & What You Get

We need approximately $500 to appeal our case, pleading innocent for attempting to pull my car in an area where a store was open.  The rest of what we are asking for is to continue to speak at meetings, call legislators, contact civil and women's rights organizations, and keep the press involved to change policy as it stands.


Other Ways You Can Help

(1.) Please sign!


a. http://thepetitionsite.com/6/law-enforcement-pr...


b. http://thepetitionsite.com/1/ask-lost-hills-she...


(2.) Please contact us through this site if interested in making calls, writing letter, or speaking at council meetings regarding this issue.


References

(I) Estimates according to data from these two sites: http://incite-national.org/media/docs/7715_tool..., http://samuelwalker.net/wp-content/uploads/2010.... 


(II) Estimate from http://www.usatoday.com/news/nation/2007-12-17-...

Our actions for public safety were done at our own expense, to the point we are broke and cannot continue putting in time without support.

Please also sign our petition:a. http://thepetitionsite.com/6/law-enforcement-pr...
Monique Lukens
Josef Dochterman
Lukens noted in the following articles:


(1)  http://malibusurfsidenews.


(2) (last paragraph) http://

(3)  http://malibusurfsidenews.

(4) http://malibu.patch.com/

(5) http://malibutimes.com/

(6) http://malibusurfsidenews.com/


Lukens and Dochterman heard speaking on the following links:


(1) Feb. 28th: (video gives easy forwarding access to see Lukens at about 1 hr. 7 min. into the video) http://malibu.granicus. 


(Meeting Minutes http://www.malibucity.)



(2) May 23rd: (video gives easy forwarding access to see Lukens at about 26 min. into the video) http://malibu.granicus.


(Meeting Minutes http://www.malibucity.)



(3) June 27th: (video gives easy forwarding access to see Lukens and Josef Dochterman 2 min. into the video) http://malibu.granicus.



(4) July 25th: (video gives easy forwarding access to see Lukens and Josef Dochterman 5 min. into the video) http://malibu.granicus. 



(5) August 8th: (video gives easy forwarding access to see Lukens and Josef Dochterman 6 1/2 min. into the video) http://malibu.granicus.


(6) August 22nd: (video gives easy forwarding access to see Lukens and Josef Dochterman 6 1/2 min. into the video, and then the Mayor and Councilperson Jefferson Wagner makes comments to me 22 min - 24 1/2 min. into the video)

http://malibu.granicus..


The Impact



This is a local (Lost Hills / Malibu Sheriff Dpt.), State, AND National Issue.

Please watch the videos on these 2 links:
http://youtube.com/watch?v=ibSwITK4jjQ


http:// 
These videos show women being restrained for pulling their cars over in populated areas to keep themselves safe during traffic stops.  One of the women had on her hazards.
Each woman are each from separate states.  It's really important women all over the nation may safely pull over in a populated, open public, lit area without fearing heavy financial penalty (as I was in Malibu, CA), being pulled out of the car, being restrained on the ground, and/or being handcuffed as in seen in the above cases.   

According to The National Police Misconduct Statistics and Reporting Project's Quarterly Q1 Report (Look here http:// ), police are accused 3 times more than the rest of the population for sexual assaults on women.
There are enough stories on a weekly basis of real and fake law enforcers raping women.  Many of these are at traffic stops.  Without a national protection in place, situations like these will continue to happen making women vulnerable to sexual assault, bodily and emotional trauma, and/or financially penalties. 

What We Need & What You Get


We need approximately $500 to appeal our case, pleading innocent for attempting to pull my car in an area where a store was open.  The rest of what we are asking for is to continue to speak at meetings, call legislators, contact civil and women's rights organizations, and keep the press involved to change policy as it stands.



Other Ways You Can Help
(1.) Please sign!

a. http://thepetitionsite.com/6/law-enforcement-pr...

b. http://thepetitionsite.com/1/ask-lost-hills-she...

(2.) Please contact us through this site if interested in making calls, writing letter, or speaking at council meetings regarding this issue.


References

(I) Estimates according to data from these two sites: http://incite-national.org/media/docs/7715_tool..., http://samuelwalker.net/wp-content/uploads/2010.... 

(II) Estimate from http://www.usatoday.com/news/nation/2007-12-17-...

story:
EnergyPark

EnergyPark is a new generation concept of outdoor exercise bikes. We have PG-Bikes which generates power up to 500watt in our parks. 
Thanks to them, people which do sports at outdoor exercise parks or personal PG-Bikes at home, can generate power and help to renewable energy systems with their own powers. 
At the same time, they gain Sports Points by producing electricity while doing exercise and they use these point as a discount on shopping.

PG-Bike

PG-Bike is exercise bike which produce electricity its own. It has a interactive panel with a touch screen. You can identify yourself this screen using your sportcard you recieved from us or cellphone rf-id module or facebook app. If you are not a member, you can register panel screen or website.

After PG-Bike recognize you. You can begin to do sport and surf to internet by using our interface.

With PG-Bike panel, you can add friends(Arkadaş) and challenge them(Meydan Oku) with your score and produced energy. With this mode make your sport more entertaining.

After you gain sports points, you can do your shoppig with lots of advantages.

 What is Our Aim

   We aim to create new healty generation and conscious about renewable energy sources to building these parks with supporting parks producing energy using our wind turbines and solar panel systems. 

With these combinations, we aim to make a new exercise parks for help people and world with your support we need to build these EnergyParks everywhere.

story:
Help us create the Conscious Cleanse On Demand.  Cleanse anytime with the support of a health coach.

The Conscious Cleanse is a 14-day program that will will help you kick start weight loss and better health. We've helped thousands of people achieve amazing results and now we need your help to create a subscription model with an automated, video-based membership program that people can access anytime and anywhere.

The Conscious Cleanse is not a diet, nor is it a traditional "cleanse." There are no calorie restrictions, you will not starve yourself, or be required to buy expensive supplements.

On the Conscious Cleanse you'll eat REAL FOOD! (Check out the mouth-watering cleanse-friendly food below.) You'll eliminate processed foods, caffeine, alcohol, sugar, and other foods that are slowing you down. The results are nothing short of astonishing.

The effects of the cleanse often go much beyond weight loss:
  • Boundless energy
  • Relief from aches and pains
  • Eliminate cravings and addictions
  • Better sleep
  • Renewed confidence
  • Improved digestion and elimination
  • Eliminate gas and bloating
  • Identify food allergies
  • Reduce fine lines
  • Glowing skin
  • And much more.....

We've sold over 30,000 copies of our book The Conscious Cleanse: Lose Weight, Heal Your Body, and Transform Your Life in 14 Days," and we're only getting started.


The Problem

There are two challenges with our current model:

1. Currently we run our live supported cleanse online 5 times per year with specified start dates. If one of our start dates doesn’t work for you, you’re left to do it alone without the support of the community or access to a health coach.

2. People feel great after the program, and for years they have asked us, "what's next?" With the Conscious Cleanse On Demand we'll be able to offer tools and support so people can live the Conscious Cleanse lifestyle (what we call the 80:20) all year long.



Our passion is people. Every story matters and every person counts. When you sign up for one of our online programs you will get personalized attention and customer support that is unparalleled in our industry.

The Conscious Cleanse On Demand will be an online platform where people can access the Conscious Cleanse at anytime–and get the support to match it year round. 

The $25,000 that we're raising will help cover a small portion of the overall cost needed to create an automated, video-based membership program. 

With your help, we'll be able to:

  • Start filming 14 days of inspirational videos plus bonus content
  • Start building the membership site
  • Continue to grow our team of health coaches so we can provide year-round support

Together we're creating a ripple effect because when more of us are healthy, more of us will reach our true potential.

What's in it for You


Our Story

Do you ever feel like you’ve been hit by a truck?

Well, Jo Schaalman has, and she is an expert in recovery and healing the body.

               

Several years ago, while preparing for medical school, Jo was t-boned by a semi-truck during a cross-country bike trip. The accident left her in chronic pain followed by weight gain, depression, and worst of all, the hopeless realization that she would be disabled for the rest of her life.

Not wanting to accept over 20 doctors’ advice, which was Prozac for her depression and Percocet for her pain, she went on journey to heal herself the only way she knew how – through eating a whole foods diet.



Jo and Jules are the co-founders of the Conscious Cleanse and the co-authors of the book The Conscious Cleanse: Lose Weight, Heal Your Body and Transform Your Life in 14 Days.


They came together based on a mutual passion for healing the body by looking at food as medicine. They are an "odd couple" of health innovators with entirely different nutrition profiles. However, their firsthand experience proves that there is no one-size-fits-all-approach to cleansing or health.

Together they’ve led thousands of people through their online supported cleanse through their accessible and lighthearted approach. They’ve been dubbed “the real deal” by founder and chief creative director Bobbi Brown, of Bobbi Brown Cosmetics, beauty editor of the TODAY show.

Vibrant health is something that everyone can access. We can make a difference with your help!

Aside from contributing financially, there are other ways to join the Conscious Cleanse Revolution. Please help us spread the word by sharing this campaign with your own friends and family through your social media networks. Like us on Facebook and follow us on Instagram and Twitter, and please reach out to us any time with thoughts, suggestions or anything else. We would love to hear from you!

Thank you for your support!

With love and green smoothies,

story:
I live in a community that encompass several tribes which are the Hopi, Navajo and San Juan Paiute. Although they are different tribes they all have one thing in common…..Diabetes! This disease is a plague among these reservations and the country as a whole. Native American communities have the highest diabetes prevalence rates of all racial and ethnic groups in the United States ( CDC 2010). With our local Health Care facility estimates of at least 41 percent of the population being diabetic or pre-diabetic, it is imperative that our community and other surrounding communities provide access to facilities and programs that promote a healthy lifestyle by a proper diet and physical activity.

Throughout the reservations many of the communities have local Wellness Centers or Fitness Facilities that provide fitness classes and exercise equipment for patient and public use. Many of these communities are located hundreds of miles from the nearest major city and because of the remote locations many of these centers have equipment that are in poor condition or not working due to lack of proper maintenance. With a repair time of one to two weeks before the nearest service provider is available, this is a discouragement to those who come to these facilities.  As an Indoor cycling instructor I need the bikes to be operating and well maintained, any bike that is not operating is one person that will not be able to attend the class. The same goes for a treadmill, elliptical or any fitness machine. Because of this I attended a service tech training in 2014 to become a certified service technician with one of the major fitness equipment manufacturers that distributes four well-known brands in the fitness market today. My re-certification comes due in September 2016 and once completed I will be starting my own business and would like to provide the repair services that are needed across the reservation and surrounding communities.

The Fitness Industry today has a wide variety of manufacturers carrying similar product lines, so each facility carries a different variety of those manufacturers equipment. Which brings me to the purpose of this campaign. I am looking to expand and attend another major manufacturer’s factory service provider certification training to be held in St. Louis, Missouri in November 2016. Having the support of two major companies will greatly enhance the success of my venture, but the real success for this venture comes from backers, supporters and believers like you who are the foundation of any business today! People who have that same desire and dream of starting a business and taking the steps to make it happen. The past couple years my dream of this business has always been that, a dream, but now I am putting it in motion and with your help we can make this dream a “REALITY”.

Below you will find the amount needed to attend the training along with some of the associated costs in moving the business forward. I appreciate you taking the time to look, read and sharing this campaign and THANK YOU!!!! 

                        Sunbear Fitness and Repair Services

                                       

                       Factory Training courses   $600.00

                                        Travel expenses  $2000.00

                                            Room/Flight

                                  Service equipment   $1400.00

                                           tools/parts

                                        Business/office   $3000.00

                                          Insur./permits

                        Campaign Goal Total   $7000.00

story:
The Rove Foam Roller 01 is a durable, versatile, and a highly effective health and fitness product that significantly improves the way athletes prepare and recover for exercise/competition, enhancing athletic potential and improving health on the go.

Compared to existing foam rollers, the Rove Roller 01's innovative transforming structural design and it's unique outer surface pattern, provide physical benefits to all levels of athletic abilities anytime, anywhere and when needed most.

Our goal is to help our athletes have access to their recovery tools when needed, by developing a product that is one of the best foam rollers available today, that also packs easily and effortlessly into their kitbag, backpack and carry on.

We want you to live a life full of travel, sport, and overall good health. Designed to go wherever life takes you. Rove: Roll. Move. Perform. 

 

 

Our pending utility patent covers just about every way to tackle this unique hinged action. Lay it flat. Roll it up. Use for prevention and recovery. Yes, we believe in magic.

 

 

Doctor's Note: Foam rolling the lat and shoulder can help relieve shoulder and lower back pain. Great for those who sit for prolonged periods of time, weight lift (carrying around children counts), or use their shoulder for any rotating movement (throwing, swimming, etc). 

Doctor's Note: Rolling your upper back or postural muscles can help alleviate neck or upper back pain associated with sitting for long periods of time (at a desk, in a car, etc). Great way to release tension and improve posture.

Doctor's Note: Rolling the quadricep can alleviate pain at the knee and hip. Great for runners, cyclists (calling all spin class enthusiasts), and pregnant women. 

 

 

- Difficult to travel with

 - Bulky to store 

 - Too many variations of foam rollers 

- Little to no education on proper technique and benefits 

 - Minimal advancements in foam roller technology  

 

Rove to recover from long flights and uncomfortable hotel beds, allowing you to feel your best even when you’re away from home.

 

 

Laying flat Rove is under an inch tall,

yet when rolled it is the same diameter as most standard rollers on the market. Not to brag but that’s pretty incredible…

 

We wanted Rove to be light enough to carry enough in your backpack or suitcase. Weighing less than 2.5lbs., it is comparable to 1 liter of water, a gym lock, or a hardcover book.

 

 

 

 

Our sliding lock mechanism is as simple and easy to use as it is gratifying to use. It took us many iterations with our engineers and finally came to a solution with using just three components.The bistable mechanism uses an integral spring feature for a gratifying "click" in both directions. 

 

 

Rove + lululemon 5 year basic T (Men's) Love Tee Crew II (Women's)

Rove Looks-like Prototype

Our first full size 3D printed prototype with cast foam components.  

The Right Size:  We Roll Up to Our Competition 

It’s clear that we stack up to other leading rollers on the market. This is amazing considering Rove can roll flat and hold more weight.

We used FEA (Finite Element Analysis) to confirm our design digitally, investigating it’s load capacity and movement under load.

Final CAD

Currently, things are very refined; almost every feature and shape now has a reason for being.

Renderings 

At this point we were pretty close to the final product and investigating Logo placements and the CMF (Colors, Materials and Finishes).

Rove’s First Blocked Out CAD Concept - Summer 2016

 Making quick CAD models helped us wrap our heads around the problem.

Here, our CAD models were simple but articulated so we can examine how it behaves as it rolls up and flattens out.

Rove’s First Looks Like Prototype - Summer 2015

This first prototype was based on a living hinge design, where the hinge is a feature in the plastic.

Tightening Things Up

7 hinges leaves a lot of “wiggle room” so we worked through many solutions for allowing things to move when you want them to and remain rigged when you don’t.

Putting the Pen to Paper: “How can we make this thing work?”

We quickly moved to 3D prototypes to be able to wrap our head around a number of complex issues with the concept.

Things That Seem Simple Are Often Not

While Rove may look simple, it was quite a task to make it work…

 

Risks and challenges

Our brand stands firmly on creating high quality goods for you, our backers!

Our prototyping stage is completed and we're ready to start the tooling and manufacturing process at a mass scale. With that comes challenges.

We're a small team so there are many challenges associated with shipping all of the orders. Once our campaign is completed we'll be sending out a survey to gather all shipping and sizing information needed to make you a happy backer.

We understand that things happen, but we pledge to keep our backers up to date.

With that comes challenges.We're a small team so there are many challenges associated with shipping all of the orders. Once our campaign is completed we'll be sending out a survey to gather all shipping and sizing information needed to make you a happy backer.We understand that things happen, but we pledge to keep our backers up to date.

story:
My Dream

My name is Gabrielle Martinez. I am 13 years old and I have been in gymnastics for 6 years. My first trial day at the gym, I was asked to skip 4 levels. I went on to win state competition twice since then. First to score a perfect 10 in bars at a state meet. I have also taken 1st place in bars for a regional competition.  Also, in 2013 I was named Top 100 gymnasts in America. I have won many first place medals in All-Around, and I am currently a USAG Level 9 competitor. Just recently I was forced to quit gymnastics because my sponsor is no longer able to help me. My mom, is a single mom who has worked hard to get me this far but I cannot continue this sport without your help. 

What We Need & What You Get

This week I was told I would be forced to leave my dream if I could not come up with the funds to continue at 5280 Gymnastics. 
Here's the scoop: I need $10,000
Unfortunately, my sponsor is no longer able to support me. Being a competitive gymnast is costly, and I need your help to fund the following!:
Monthly tuition
Coaches fees
Floor routines
Upcoming competition season
All donations will go towards fees acquired at 5280 Gym, and additional funds will go towards the 2015 competition season. 

The Impact

Funding Gabby's Dream will help young Gabrielle to live out her lifetime dream of becoming an Olympic Gymnast. Her passion and dedication is unbelievable. Your help will ensure Gabby continues to grow and strive to someday reach her Olympic Dreams.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you'd like, you can also help to fund Gabby's dream in a few other ways:
Paypal: https://www.paypal.com/us/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_flow&SESSION=l7_ZQZaTXwwvsXSXgWkO0P1sjGtWkSD2Xx7IoAG-b93gWXdnd47eSiJMc7G&dispatch=5885d80a13c0db1f8e263663d3faee8d66f31424b43e9a70645c907a6cbd8fb4
Facebook, Twitter, Instagram: Share this link with your Facebook friends and spread the word.

Don't have the cash to help? Your love & prayers are appreciated.

story:
The Company:

Mission

The time when men were required to be indifferent to health and wellness has come to an end.  Focus on physical exercise in gyms or on teams, attention to nutrition and concern for fashion and style are truly the norm.  However, one element of good health has been overlooked and underserved – skincare.  Healthy skin is just as important as any other category of wellness, yet few have attempted to create products that truly meet the needs of a man - lightweight, simple and easy to use moisturizers that protect the skin without leaving any residue or shine. For every man whose aim is self-improvement, whose aim is to be better than the day before – Ruffhaus crew is here to serve you.

About Ruffhaus Crew 

Ruffhaus Crew is a boutique men's skincare brand that is completely new to the market - and you can expect products unlike anything else available. High moisturization, low residue with a cool refreshing feel are the defining characteristics of every product.  Located in Montreal, Quebec, the products have been developed with the harshness of the Canadian winter in mind. Expect high performance from the Ruffhaus Crew Moisturizers with BCAAs.


Products

Moisturizers formulated to fit healthy, active, lifestyles.  Use morning or night time. Before or after a workout.  Or any other time your skin needs a fix. Get the job done. Nothing more and nothing less.



Face Moisturizer 

25 ingredients that are perfectly combined to moisturize, repair and protect.  Take care of your skin - it's going to be with you for awhile.


 


Hand Moisturizer 

A specially formulated treatment for your hands.  You put your hands through a lot! They deserve the same care as everything else.


     


Lip Balm 

Beat the dry weather and keep lips smooth and hydrated.


Formulation Highlights:


BCAAs 

Branched Chain Amino Acids.  This is the good stuff and the cornerstone of Ruffhaus products. They are good for your muscles but great for your skin too.  Just a fractional amount repairs the damage that we do on a daily basis.


Essential Oils - Eucalyptus, Jojoba, Rosemary, Lemon

These oils do double duty - they nourish the skin and form a protective layer that prevents moisture from leaving your skin.  Essential oils pack a punch but they're lightweight and did we mention they smell great! (You'll thank us for these!)


Caffeine 

You've heard of it before - it reduces inflammation and redness through vasoconstriction.  It works in concert with the other ingredients to keep your skin looking great.


Provitamin B5 

It's like glycerin but better!  Higher impact ingredient that doesn't irritate the skin and isn't sticky.  All the good stuff without the mess.


Vitamin E 

It's the anti-oxidant we know and love.  Not all forms of it are active though. Ruffhaus uses tocopherol - the best kind.


Benefits:

  • High performance 
  • Lightweight
  • Non-Oily
  • Non-Greasy
  • No Residue
  • Paraben-free



Ruffhaus Team: 

Products have been developed by athletes, engineers and scientists to deliver the best possible results.

For more information, feel free to contact one of our team members!


Al Esmail, Eng.

CEO, Chief Formulator

al.esmail@ruffhauscrew.com


Derrick Campbell, Coach, Canadian Men's Short Track Speedskating Team

Product Development Advisor

derrick.campbell@ruffhauscrew.com


Ferrere Jr. Clerveaux, B.Eng

Social Media Advisor

ferrere.clerveaux@ruffhauscrew.com


Tariq Esmail, B.Sc., Biology & Psychology

Marketing Advisor

tariq.esmail@ruffhauscrew.com


Next Steps:

R&D is done and the prototypes are complete.  The feedback has been great, so it's time to manufacture.  All funds will cover the costs of manufacturing the first run.  Any extra funds will be used to develop more outstanding products and promoting the quality of these products.  So join Ruffhaus and show your support.  As reward, you'll be among the very first to get in on Ruffhaus Crew.


Spread the word!


Web: www.ruffhauscrew.com

Facebook: www.facebook.com/getruffhaus 

Twitter: @ruffhauscrew

Instagram: www.instagram.com/ruffhauscrew

story:
Do you know someone struggling with staying motivated to LOSE WEIGHT?  

Have you ever needed to see a FRIENDLY face or hear a FRIENDLY voice that could encourage you to NEVER GIVE UP?  

Well my name is Meka DeMille and I'm the creator of the Crunch Don't Munch Workout Program!  With over 20 YEARS of choreography experience and a WHOLE LOT OF ENERGY I have successfully designed a workout routine that I know you'll enjoy!

There are so many people in this world that need someone to help them FIGHT against UNHEALTHY habits!  The effects of obesity leads to stress, depression, diabetes and so many other health issues that can RUIN lives!  That's why I'm PASSIONATE about what WE can do TOGETHER! To learn more about the Crunch Don't Munch story check out my interview with Terra Hall of FoxNews!


What We Need & What You Get

Producing an instructional DVD and an album can get REALLY EXPENSIVE! As a small business owner I MUST be conscious of ALL expenses while making sure that the Crunch Don't Munch Program gets to the people that TRULY need it! With the help of great friends and family I have been able to save dollars. However, there’s still much cost involved. To create the BEST product I hire music producers, audio engineers, graphic designers as well as UNIQUE workout equipment. It all adds up. So we are asking for $10,000 to pay for the following.

1.  Crunch Don't Munch Instructional DVD - Features ORIGINAL music and Choreography and EASY WORKOUT ROUTINES for YOU,YOUR FAMILY & FRIENDS! ($5000 - Covers video production, DVD artwork and DVD duplication)

2.  Crunch Don't Munch CD's - Features 8 ENERGETIC, FAMILY-ORIENTED songs that will make you GET UP & MOVE!!! ($3000 - Covers CD audio production (studio time & mastering of 8 songs), album artwork and CD duplication and digital release.

3.  Crunch Don't Munch T-Shirts - Features the Crunch Don't Munch logo that will let EVERYONE know YOU'RE ON YOUR WAY TO LIVING A HEALTHY LIFESTYLE!!! ($2000 - Artwork and Multi-color Screen-printing)

NOTE: IF OUR GOAL ISN'T REACHED WE WILL DISTRIBUTE PERKS IN A REVISED MANNER.  ALL CONTRIBUTORS WILL BE CONTACTED WITHIN 10 DAYS AFTER THE END OF THIS INITIAL CAMPAIGN AND INFORMED OF THE REVISIONS.

ATTENTION: CHECK OUT OUR PERKS TO SEE WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU!!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Rashod Brown and I am a 23 year old transman who lives in Pittsburgh PA and I have been on testosterone for 11 months. A little about my background, I grew up in foster care and aged out when I turned 21. When I aged out I was all alone and only had my friends and the Gay and Lesbian Community Center to help me. I am looking for help to raise money for my top surgery because I don't have the means to do so myself. I am looking for a job right now but being a transman it is hard to actually get one. This surgery is so important to me because it means I'm one step closer to becoming the true me, the me I know that's in this body. I just want to be that person who can feel comfortable in their own body and safe. If I can achieve this goal and get my top surgery, I will be forever grateful to everyone who has helped me and everyone who wanted to but couldn't. I'm looking for a way to tell my story.


What I Need & What You Get

  • $7,000 for the Double Incision Method
  • $2,000 for ManSculpture (lipo)
  • $2,000 for the hotel, gas, food, rent, medications, aftercare and anything else that comes up unexpected. 
  • $11,000 in total for everything.

  • The unique perks that you will be getting for helping me out are:
  • $10 - A thank you card written by me to you.
  • $20 - Rose necklace hand made by me. 

  • $25 - Octopus necklace hand made by me.

  • $30 - My dogs paw prints on canvas made by my dogs and I. 
  • $50 - An 8x10" Drip technique painting sealed with gloss varnish made by my roommate. 

     

  • $100 - Hand sculpted figurine
  • If I don't reach my entire goal, the funds will be put in my savings account and I will hopefully have a job and add to that so I can get the surgery. 

The Impact

The difference your contribution will make:

If I got top surgery with your help it would open up a flow of new doors. I would have more confidence, self love, pride, I would be happy, I wouldn't have to keep beating myself up on why I'm not good enough or strong enough.  

Risks & Challenges

The risks and obstacles I may face on the way to achieving this goal.

The risk and obstacles i may face are a loss of my self. I'm not the one who can just ask for money. I like helping people and making their lives happier but lately I have realized that if I want this done soon so I can move on with my life I need help. I have started realizing that asking for help is not a bad thing. Everyone needs a little help now and then. So this is me here asking you to please help me help myself. Every little donation helps even the small ones because something is better than nothing.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please help me get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
All orders will ship AFTER the campaign has ended by June 2016.

To meet all doctors and team, visit our website.

Say Goodbye to Unhealthy Lungs

V-Meds' Lung Cleansing Therapy is the only all-natural and homeopathic lung treatment that uses no cortisone and no steroids. The best thing about this is, there aren't any side effects.
Works better than inhalers, many customers claim.
Breathing is a big thing. It affects mobility, sleep, mood, and longevity. There's nothing worse than feeling your chest tighten making it hard to breathe. This could happen to anyone suffering from asthma, COPD, bronchitis, and other lung problems. With V-Meds' all-natural and homeopathic formula, you can:
  • Alleviate congestion and clear your airways
  • Suppress coughing, and
  • Stop wheezing fast


 

How It Works

V-Meds, with its nano-mist technology, can deliver its all-natural and homeopathic formulated solution deep into the lungs as nano-mist, where it reaches the small air sacs - allowing the natural healing and cleansing process to begin.
Natural Lung Cleanse Works Better then Cortisone Inhalers, and Greatly Reduces for Many! Over 3000 units now in use!
Nano-mist is a concentration of droplets that are measured in nano-meters. Droplet size can very from 50 nano-meters to 400 nano-meters. To give you a perspective of how small that is: an atom is 1/10 to 5/10 of a nano-meter. That is how it penetrates so deep into the lungs. It is the size of the droplets that can carry even smaller particles of ingredients all the way to the deep alveoli region of the lungs and providing soothing relief.


 

What Is It Made Of?


 

What We Need and What Perks You Get

Most of our funding will go toward purchasing and building a new larger Clean Room. The balance will be used for research and development. We have plans to formulate new solutions for other medical conditions.

 

What People Are Saying

Thousands of our Lung Cleansing Kit are in use right now. Many customers have claimed we saved or radically improved their lives. Some even cry on the phone with gratitude. Many of our customer have replaced cortisone inhalers and are now repeat customers. And the fact that we are selling hundreds more of our refills demonstrates that our product works for LIFE.

My granddaughter got rid of a bad cold in 24 hours. Expelled tons of mucus.

V-Meds CEO's granddaughter using the nano-mist hardware


All our claims are verifiable by actual users.


THIS CAMPAIGN WILL RELIEVE MANY PEOPLE

BE A LIFE SAVIOR TODAY!

*Please note, all orders will ship AFTER the campaign has ended by June 2016. We will keep all contributors updated on the status of shipments.

story:
I have placed an initial goal of $2000 to help this beautiful, sweet little girl but anything above that would be an extra blessing!

 

This beautiful little girl was born with cerebral palsy.  Although she wasn't expected to live long, she has thrived under her mom Amber's care.  Instead of complaining about how unfair life sometimes can be, both Amber and Gabby smile every single day.    Amber has devoted her life to taking care of her daughter.    She has remained positive and unbeat even when her own health was in jeopardy.   Recently Amber's fiancee had a seizure while he was at work.  Because of this, they took away his ability to operate heavy machinery.  Since he works in construction, he lost his job because he can no longer do what the job entails.  This was the family's only income besides the little bit of disability and food assistance that they get from the state.  They simply are not making it.  Each month Gabby has to worry about whether or not she has a place to live, food to eat and lights.   In September the vehicle that Amber uses to take her daughter to the doctor's office and to get her medical attention will be repossessed if she doesn't figure out how to make the payment.  Her fiancee is seeing the doctor and they are hoping to be able to get his health under control so that he can resume working but until then, they are struggling.

 

This family desparately needs your help.  Any small contribution would be greatly appreciated.    Let's make Gabby smile!!
story_txt:
I have placed an initial goal of $2000 to help this beautiful, sweet little girl but anything above that would be an extra blessing!
 
This beautiful little girl was born with cerebral palsy.  Although she wasn't expected to live long, she has thrived under her mom Amber's care.  Instead of complaining about how unfair life sometimes can be, both Amber and Gabby smile every single day.    Amber has devoted her life to taking care of her daughter.    She has remained positive and unbeat even when her own health was in jeopardy.   Recently Amber's fiancee had a seizure while he was at work.  Because of this, they took away his ability to operate heavy machinery.  Since he works in construction, he lost his job because he can no longer do what the job entails.  This was the family's only income besides the little bit of disability and food assistance that they get from the state.  They simply are not making it.  Each month Gabby has to worry about whether or not she has a place to live, food to eat and lights.   In September the vehicle that Amber uses to take her daughter to the doctor's office and to get her medical attention will be repossessed if she doesn't figure out how to make the payment.  Her fiancee is seeing the doctor and they are hoping to be able to get his health under control so that he can resume working but until then, they are struggling. 
 
This family desparately needs your help.  Any small contribution would be greatly appreciated.    Let's make Gabby smile!!

story:
With "MUE Ultimate" software, we can bring easy email transfers, backup and migration to everyone with email

A short while ago, a client told us she wanted to switch her email hosting from GoDaddy to a larger, CPanel based server. Not a problem, we thought, we'll just transfer everything over in an evening and everything will be fine. That's when we discovered that it was "impossible" to transfer email out of GoDaddy into a new webmail, except to Gmail, and that it was "impossible" to then transfer email out of Gmail to cPanel - and this information came from a cPanel administrator, the smartest one I've ever known. Soon, we heard the same "impossible" answer from all corners of the web. 

So we invented MUE (the fabulous and affordable MassUpdater Email Import & Backup software), and MUE Expanded for people with multiple domains and many email accounts. Both are already available on Amazon!

Check out how easily it already works with GoDaddy:

And, below, here's it in action with Gmail. Note how simple this software is to use! We made sure to make it visually appealing and brimming with simplicity, because we know from experience that attractive software is easier-to-use software. 

Donated funds will allow us to make this process just as simple for people with all kinds of email accounts:

As soon as we started promoting MUE, we discovered that many, many people with many, many types of email accounts didn't know how to transfer their email from one server to another. 

Turns out this "keep your email" need is a lot bigger than we thought! 

People all over the world are hanging on to old email accounts, just for archives. That's silly!

This project will allow us to add all POP3 and IMAP accounts to MUE, so that just about anyone with email can use the software we build to take that email with them to new servers. 

If this project is funded, we'll be able to come out with a new version of the software that allows people to transfer their email (completely intact, with html encoding, attachments, and all) from GoDaddy to Google Aps, from Hotmail to  Fastmail, from AOL to Runbox, from Yahoo to VerveHosting and More!! 

MUE Ultimate will allow everyone to experience the meditative calm of knowing they still have their email after switching hosts.

This project will make email transfers a snap for everyone!

The funds raised will allow us to devote a month just to product development of the new software, and will cover promotions to let the world know that there's a new option for everyone who wants to move their email. 

This is an essential need - old email accounts can include important business paperwork, invoices, price quotes and priceless notes from family and loved ones. 

It's ridiculous for people to leave all this information behind just because they wish to switch webmail providers.

We invented the technology so that Gmail and GoDaddy customers don't have to, and now we want to make the same thing possible for everyone!

MUE transfers from Gmail and GoDaddy to new servers - this project will make it possible for almost anyone with almost any email to use the same simple software, and Keep Their Email!

We've heard from people with Hotmail, AOL, and Yahoo email asking us if we can make it possible for them to transfer their email to new servers as well, and this project will make that happen! 

This project will help make one basic part of modern life - switching webhosts - easier, faster, and less stressful. In other words, it makes everyone in the whole world a little bit less worried. How great is that? 

Let's Get Started with MUE Ultimate!

story:
Hi, I'm Jackie Prell. My project combines two passions: good, organic, nutrient-dense food and how to grow it.

I started a certified organic sugarcane juice business a few years ago. My husband and I grow the sugarcane, limes, lemons, tumeric and most of the other ingredients that go into the juice on our two farms in Hawaii. People love the juice, it's delicious and good for you. It's a golden ambrosia, an ancient food that your body recognizes and assimilates easily, the opposite of the processed white sugar we're all familiar with. It's got electrolytes, anti-oxidants, B vitamins and more. It's low in simple sugars and rich in complex carbohydrates, sustaining your energy level all day long.

Our juice business has grown organically, with no debt, and being farmers first, we'd like to keep it that way, which is where you come in.

Last summer, in the midst of building a new certified kitchen for our juice operation, I applied for a USDA Producer Value-Added grant (matching funds...), which I was recently awarded. This is great news, except the matching funds have been spent on renovations and other start-up costs.  For every dollar I spend, I'll be reimbursed by the USDA for half that amount. This means, every dollar you contribute will actually be worth a dollar and a half. 

The $24,000 will go towards bottles and the $12,000 we're reimbursed towards a new freezer and 2 cane cleaners, rounding out our business wish list and assuring us of a supply of bottles at the very lowest cost. If we're partially funded, our project will be scaled down to match the funds raised.

Your reward? Juice, and lots of it! And a Cane Rush cartoon book. We're also offering as rewards, organic dried apple bananas, spicy kale chips, tumeric-infused hot sauce, farm tours and lessons in Natural Farming, and private dinners at Sweet Cane Cafe. Cane Rush t-shirts too! Boost us with a large enough donation and we'll name a juice after you!

And the how-to-grow nutrient-dense food part? I'm including instructions on making your own organic soil inoculant, which revitalizes soil by encouraging the growth of mycorrhizae. Mycorrhizae form a symbiotic relationship between plants and the soil, benefiting both. They provide nutrients and water from the soil to the plant and they take waste products from plants, sequestering carbon in soil humus. Check out my website, www.kalapanaorganics.com  and help spread the word about Korean Natural Farming. Korean Natural Farming is awesome: cheap, effective and do-it-yourself. Even if you can't donate, please pass on this information to all those urban farmers, school gardeners, roof-top gardeners, non-profits, ag professors, organic and conventional farmers, and other green thumbers that you may know. It's knowledge that can help change the world.

The ripple effect of our success: we'll support other local organic farmers by buying their produce and products. We'll continue mentoring, provide jobs, and launch new products, such as kale chips, tumeric-infused hot sauce, and taro burgers.

My husband and I have been farming in Hawaii a combined 50+ years, a noble but necessarily profitable endeavor. Thank you for helping us to succeed in our farm-to-entrepreneur venture. You're making Hawaii and the world a sweeter place.

story:
Short Summary

Lisa is a wonderful person.  She has lost the little self confidence she had due to her loss of hair, scars, and now her teeth breaking off.   Lisa has stage 3 breast cancer.  It was diagnosed late and it was aggresively treated.  She did 6 months of weekly chemo and 35 straight days of radiation.  These along with her medications has caused her teeth to decay and break and has her in great pain.  No dental insurance.  No family to help.  Her friends love her dearly but have no funds to help.  The estimate to surgically remove her teeth and make dentures is just under $9000.  

Lisa is disabled with PTSD due to a childhood of obscene torture.  She loves people in spite of the abuse and wants to help others.  She always kept a great attitude during cancer treatment and made an effort to cheer other patients and listened to their problems and fears.  Even though she is in pain daily with hand and foot syndrome along with the dental pain she still cares so much about the pain of others.  She wants to continue helping others.

Lisa deserves a break.  Please help her feel like smiling again.  She needs to know there are good people out there who care about her.

 

Thank you for your time.
