story:
Short Summary

My name is Cheryl Neuman, and I was diagnosed with small cell lung cancer in May of 2011. I am the one in the picture holding the dog.  A Petscan in October of that year, showed no cancer, but another scan in January 2012 showed the cancer reoccurring in the form of 4 tumors, one rather large at over 3 cm. I am in my second round of chemotheray treatments, and the doctors indicate to be as aggresive as we can be in treatment, radiation therapy should be added to the chemo.  Our insurance company is refusing to pay for a Petscan needed to adequately guage the radiation field for treatment, as well as to adequately guage the cancer growth to formulate other treatment options, as well.

What We Need

We need to raise $4,000, to pay for a Petscan Blue Cross/Blue Shield is refusing to cover. By letter they said in effect, "a Petscan for this type of recurring cancer is not an effective, or approved theray".  They are in effect saying that their view of  the prognosis is not good enough for them to cover the scan cost.  In an Appeal subsequent to their denial, part of the process was a conversation our Radiologist had with a Blue Cross/Blue Shield doctor, who said, "if it were my patient, I would be wanting to do exactly the same thing, but unfortunately we won't cover the cost".

The Impact

The scan could lead the way to adding radiation treatment to help in this fight against a particularly aggresive and lethal cancer form, as well as to determine other treatment, once the extent of the tumor growth is adequately measured.....a Catscan last week is showing the large tumor to be growning, and radiation would definitely go a long way in fighting that growth.

Other Ways You Can Help

Any help is appreciated with hearfelt gratitude.  Should monetary assistance not be possible, I understand, as we are having a tough time too with medical  bills and everything else.....if dollars are not possible, I repectfully ask for any prayers you can contribute.

Thank you!

story:
Hello My name is Audra, I am the second oldest of 5 children, my sister Tanya whom is 5 years younger then me has had an ongoing medical issue and since September of 2012 has been in and out of the hostpital. She has had 2 surgery in 2012 as well due to this medical issue. We are still unsure of what is going on and how this can be fixed she is going to see a specialist this month.

My sister and her husband own their home that they share with their 4 dogs, Kesha, Austin, Mekko and Marvin, they are her children as with all this medical she is unable to have any babies of her own.

The  money being raised is to help so they do not lose their home, the  morgage is $1500 per month and they are as of right behind on this due to her medical issues.

Where Your Contributions Will Go

 Most of the contrbutions will go toward getting Tanya and Broc caught up on the morgage so they are able to staty in their home.

Another portion will go for Gas as it take gas to drive back and forth to the doctor

Other will go for what every they may need that comes up along the way

story:
My name is Nia Muhammad. I am raising money in order to purchase and install a Rainwater Harvesting tank for Eugemot Orphanage in Ghana. The children currently fetch water from a stream and use it for drinking, bathing, cleaning, and cooking. The water they fetch is a light brown color. Many of the children suffer from skin rashes and ailments and other health problems due to improper sanitation conditions. I want to get this water tank for them in order to improve their quality of life by improving their health and sanitation conditions. 

I visited Ghana last summer and volunteered at a rural family health clinic. I went to the Orphanage a couple of times and was very moved and concerned with their living conditions. In this day and age I feel that all of the people of the world should have access to clean drinking water. Your donations will make that a reality for these children.  

 This past April I volunteered in Fiji on Water Construction Project where I learned to install these Rain Water Harvesting Systems. It is a very simple system that catches the rain and carries it inside the tank. A filter is attached to the tap to ensure cleanliness. 

Your donation is greatly appreciated.

story:
Short Summary

We are fortunate to have a family cottage on a peaceful, quiet lake surrounded by 3 acres of mature forest.  The century old log cottage is rustic thiand authentic and nurtures the body and spirit.  We've owned this cottage for 10 years now.  The previous owners who had loved it for over 32 years had called the cottage their "Little Piece of Paradise".
 
We would love to donate time at our piece of paradise to families of cancer survivors through the Cottage Dreams loan program and to families with loved ones who are wheelchair dependent.
 
A few alterations to the cottage would make it more accessible and enjoyable for the families.
 
For those of you who are fortunate enough to have a cottage get away, you will already know how magical it is to just spend time looking out at nature, at times spottig small or big wildlife, and sharing meals in the great outdoors.  We are very fortunate to own a uniquely rustic, century old log cottage that wraps its visitors in warm and lulls them to relax, and get refocused on the truly meaningful things in life of time with loved ones.

 

What We Need & What You Get

What We Need
I would like your help to acquire the materials only since labour would be donated by friends and family.
 
A few modifications could make the cottage much more accessible:
1) Replace the bathroom door to open outward vs. inward.
2) Install a wider step in shower
3) Install grip bars for the toilet and shower.
4) Build temporary ramps to bridge the single step from the kitchen to the living room, and the one step from onto the deck.
5) Replace the muskoka room screen door with a retractable one.
 
What You Get
You'll get to help make this happen for a great cause.
 
As well, for
$1 - you'll get a virtual High Five to thank you for your support
$5 - you'll get photo updates of the prorgress
$20 - you'll get your name etched on a wood plank used to build the ramp
$500 - you'll get to spend a weekend with 7 others at this "Little Piece of Paradise" and take away beautiful memories for life and gain a better appreciation of how wonderful this cottae experience would be for families that have been through so much.

The Impact

Medical treatments often drain families in every aspect of life, including financially.  Through programs like Cottage Dreams where we can donate stays at our cottage, we hope to share our cottage with other families who can spend time to reconnect and rejuvenate their spirits from the rigours of appointments and treatement. 
 
Your help will make this possible and open up a little piece of paradise to those families who have already been through so much.

Other Ways You Can Help

Friend us on FB to follow our progress: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100003605753228
Comment on our website with your words of support: bit.ly/ZgWvrN
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ShadowLkCottage
Share your cottage with respite programs or Cottage Dreams.

story:
Nick's Story

Meet Nick. A 5 year old with the most amazing spirit. He's autistic, but that doesn't stop his Angry Birds addiction or his ability to truly enjoy himself.  Throughout his 5 years, Nick has been in and out of the hospital (his colon does not function normally which causes him severe pain and other complications). He knows more about pain and suffering that most people will learn in a lifetime. 

 

Recently, Nick had an appendecostomy tube put in. The hope was that this procedure would help Nick function normally. The procedure hasn't worked. Nick and his Mama's life have been turned upside down. They can't go anywhere or do anything for fear Nick will have an accident. His mama (Chris Davis) has now taken on the role of nurse. 

 

On March 17, 2013, Chris was given the news that Nick will now need major surgery. The plan is to remove his colon and then give him a colostomy bag. When he gets older they hope to do what is call a pull through to stretch his small intestine down and reconnect it. This news is rough for any patient to hear... but for a 5 year old? Yikes! Chris and Nick will likely be at Riley Children's Hospital in Indianapolis for at least a month. The last thing Chris should be worried about is bills. She's going to be closing her photography business for awhile to focus on her baby boy. 

 

How Can You Help?

 

Instead of getting that Starbucks Mocha, donate so we can help alleviate some of the stress for this amazing and resiliant family.

He knows more about pain and suffering that most people will learn in a lifetime. 
 
Recently, Nick had an appendecostomy tube put in. The hope was that this procedure would help Nick function normally. The procedure hasn't worked. Nick and his Mama's life have been turned upside down. They can't go anywhere or do anything for fear Nick will have an accident. His mama (Chris Davis) has now taken on the role of nurse. 
 
On March 17, 2013, Chris was given the news that Nick will now need major surgery. The plan is to remove his colon and then give him a colostomy bag. When he gets older they hope to do what is call a pull through to stretch his small intestine down and reconnect it. This news is rough for any patient to hear... but for a 5 year old? Yikes! Chris and Nick will likely be at Riley Children's Hospital in Indianapolis for at least a month. The last thing Chris should be worried about is bills. She's going to be closing her photography business for awhile to focus on her baby boy. 
 
How Can You Help?
 
Instead of getting that Starbucks Mocha, donate so we can help alleviate some of the stress for this amazing and resiliant family.

story:
Short Summary

Whole Body Health & Healing for individuals with chronic psychiatric illness & financial difficulty.

Hello! My name is Elvia Knoll, and I am the Executive Director for La Via Sana. About a year ago, we started a Social Enterprise to fill a gap that exists in Austin, Texas. 

You see, we are ranked 50th in all of the U.S. for mental health services.

One of the reasons for this is the stigma and shame associated with illness.

Well , people need solutions. Not just another pill... but wellness. 

You CAN be a part of a community of people who believe in MIND, BODY, & SOUL for wellness. . . a community that believes our health is a dynamic mystery that needs multiple resources for healing and recovery. 

Psychiatric Illnesses are just illnesses. People can and do heal, but we need to create empathy, and environments where people can get help... not just for the brain, but for the WHOLE BODY.

We need a Start-Up fund to help get us off the ground.

You can be a part of that. 

People fill out simple application forms to assess need and to specify requests.

We want to help as many as we can, but we need funding. 

The funds go to La Via Sana, a 501(c)3 nonprofit founded in 2008 by Ronald and Blanca Knoll, our founders and main source of funding. 

The Impact

We want people to know there is HOPE for healing!

Our project is cutting through all the stigma and silence and focusing on solutions and HOPE. We need to focus on Wellness. We need to educate about mental wellness. We need to empower people to take care of themselves.

With 1 in 4 suffering from mental health issues in any given year... we need solutions. We need to get back to basics and for individuals to embrace wellness. This is valuable to the our community and to the world.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Can you share about this with your friends and family?
  • Can you help to get the word out and make our campaign visible?
  • Just use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Hey family, my name is Preston Smiles and I am the Co-founder of The Love Mob, organized Acts of Love. I have lived my from the belief that we are all one soul family, and that underneath our stories about each other is our truth, that we are all in this thing called life together.  And that's why I believe it's my job, as a global citizen to step in where I can. Water scarcity is real and I'm ready to do my part to tackle it. I'm raising 3k out of the 15k it takes to build the well. 

More people die each year from unsafe water than from all forms of violence, including war. To put an end to such avoidable deaths, it is imperative to supply clean, potable water to those who have no access to it. This, in turn, will slow and eventually stop the spread of water born diseases and make a serious dent in the 5 million deaths per year caused by water related diseases. Each well provides water for about 500 people for 20 years, and we'll also provide hygiene and sanitation education to the youth and women of the village in order to help ensure the projects sustainability. 

Water is a fundamental human need. Each person on Earth requires at least 20 to 50 liters of clean, safe water a day for drinking, cooking, and simply keeping themselves clean.

Polluted water isn’t just dirty—it’s deadly. Some 1.8 million people die every year of diarrheal diseases likecholera. Tens of millions of others are seriously sickened by a host of water-related ailments—many of which are easily preventable.

I have traveled through a lot of the world but Africa has always been on my list of place to go when I had a really good reason. So when E.P.I.C (Everyday people initiating change) invited me to be one of 8 people to build a clean water well I said YES immediately. I've already bought my ticket, the three thousand is for the well and to see where We can be of assistance around the villages.  Little things go a long way, and just to know that we as a human family have each others back is a huge thing. I do these types of things every where I go including in Los Angeles and the feedback is always the same, people are blown away that people still care. So this is our opportunity to do it in Africa. One of the main points I want to stress is that, this is not charity for the "poor africans", this is family doing what family should do when people don't have basic needs like water and proper sanitation. People often ask me what I'm willing to die for and this is something that I'm willing to put my life on the line for. We must stand up and be living examples of the good/change we wish to see in this world.

story:
My name is Tyler Seidel. I am the son of Ms. Jane Seidel.

I have decided to create a fund for my mother called "Purple Kisses and Kidneys". Some of you may know that she is in the midst of kidney failure and is suffering from a rare kidney disease called Focal Segmental Glomerulosclerosis.

Ms. Jane is Director of Washington Catholic's Early Childhood Program as well as the head preschool teacher at the school. She has been involved in the program for 15 years allowing the early childhood of the town to flourish into something magnificent.

She picked up a second job as a waitress at the local country club to help save money for her expenses. She also tutors children with the little amount of free time that she can make.

She has done so much for the community of Washington, Indiana. She has touched so many lives and I am proud to call her my mother. This is a way for people to help her in her time of need. She is constantly donating her time as a helping hand and I hope to see this foundation excel.

Donations

There are countless expenses involved for Ms. Jane's situation

  • The funding is set at a small goal of $1500. I hope to coordinate much more money and contributors may donate after the goal is achieved.
  • Surgery costs, doctor visits, room costs, etc.
  • Ms. Jane will be out of work for some time so the expenses will be hard to cover.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Help spread the word of "Purple Kisses and Kidneys" by sharing the link.
  • Benefits: Saturday, July 19, 2014
    Lunch Cookout: 11 am – 2 pm at Mulligans
    (To Volunteer: contact Shannon Lee (812) 698-1302 after July 13)

    Fish Fry: 2 pm – 6 pm Washington Catholic Grounds
    (To Volunteer: contact Teresa Joyce (812) 254-2883 or Nathan Gabhart (812) 259-1703)

Read her article in The Washington Times Herald

http://www.washtimesherald.com/local/x1927840667/Giving-back-to-Miss-Jane

Learn more about Focal Segmental Glomerulosclerosis

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Focal_segmental_glomerulosclerosis

story:
Referral program is a GO.  Two easy steps to earn your free Helix:

Share your own personalized referral link and anybody that contributes to our campaign through your link will help you earn rewards!

How it works: Simply log in to Indiegogo to get your personal tracking URL, then press the share buttons or share your unique URL (to the left of the main video at the top of the page). Spread the word about us with your friends all over the Internet and you'll earn refunds quickly! You can even track your own progress by visiting your Indiegogo "My Profile" page and clicking on "Referrals."



Our team has been developing the Helix for a few years now.  We have gone through hundreds of iterations, not to mention lots of toothpaste.   The Helix is our gentle and effective denture preventer.

We are really excited to be at this stage of the launch and invite you to join us in this brushing revolution!

Unfortunately we won't be able to ship to Germany, Italy, and Laos due to Li-Ion restrictions in those countries.


What’s the big deal about a circular brushing motion?  Our gum line and tooth surfaces are naturally curved, making the most effective motion one that sweeps along the gum line.  The Helix's complete circular motion conforms to our natural tooth structure. It removes plaque at the gum line and leaves a squeaky polish on tooth surfaces.

Most electric toothbrushes on the market currently oscillate in a curved or linear manner. The oscillation draws battery power to force the brush head to undergo rapid acceleration and deceleration.  This causes energy to be wasted in the form of vibration, noise, and heat.

Each of the 8 bristle clusters has the exact same cleaning capability.  The small circular motion makes cleaning hard-to-reach places, like behind the molars, a breeze.

Brushing with the Helix is a completely new experience.  The cleaning sensation is so gentle on the teeth and gums that it will surprise you.  The Helix inspires confidence in our smile.


Cleaning the tongue is the hidden gem of oral hygiene.  Our tongue is a huge harbor for microorganisms; in fact, it is a major cause of halitosis (bad breath)*.  Helix's specially designed plaque blasters break up the buildup, in essence stopping the colonization of our tongue.

Not only does the Helix improve our breath, it helps our ability to taste, and is an excellent tool to increase the overall health of our bodies**.

Helix is the brush we can trust to keep us #fresh, #kissable, and #healthy.

*https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Halitosis#Tongue

**http://www.mayoclinic.org/healthy-lifestyle/adu...


Overbrushing* is when we brush too forcefully with any toothbrush.  It can cause gum sensitivity, gum recession, and even damage to our enamel.

The Helix is unique because it gently pulses its bristles to notify us before overbrushing occurs.  This haptic feedback acts as our oral hygiene coach.

*http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gingival_recession#Causes


To charge, plug the battery pack into any USB port.  No charging cradle, no wires, no fuss.  Helix is powered by Lithium Ion Technology.

One charge lets you brush two times a day for 30 days.  Efficient mechanical design lends to minimized energy loss due to vibration, heat, and sound.

Helix is perfect for business trips, vacations, and camping. 

Bring it with you wherever you go.





The bristles of the Helix are softer than most ultra soft toothbrushes, yet the Helix is still able to thoroughly clean tooth surfaces and crevices.  Why?  That is the beauty of the complete circular motion of the brush head.  It forces the bristles to move, not allowing them to flex between oscillations.

We tested and chose a softer bristle filaments to ensure a proper yet gentle brushing in these three types of brush heads:

  • Standard Tapered:     0.12mm filament (included)
  • Standard Flat:              0.12mm filament (included)
  • Soft Flat:                     0.10mm filament (optional)

Another incredible thing about the Helix’s circular motion is its ability to preserve the cleaning capability of the brush heads.   In traditional manual and power toothbrushes, the bristles splay out with time making them more and more ineffective with use.

The Helix’s circular motion actually preserves the structure of the bristles…  making them clean just as well at 3 months as when they were brand new.

Though we still recommend changing out the brush heads every 3 months for hygienic reason.


The Helix comes with a flat and a tapered end brush head.

If you would like replacement brush heads, add the following amount to your pledge:  (non-US orders add $5 shipping)

         $20 for 2 soft brush heads (two 0.10mm flat)

         $20 for 2 standard brush heads (one 0.12mm flat   &   one 0.12mm tapered)

         $35 for 4 standard brush heads (two 0.12mm flat   &   two 0.12mm tapered)

         $55 for 8 standard brush heads (four 0.12mm flat  &   four 0.12mm tapered)






Coming soon!


1.  What are the essential criteria for a good toothbrush?

High Cleaning Efficacy: Bristle tips should have positive displacement to get the job done.  Many vibrating or oscillating type toothbrush bristle tip have large stagnation areas in their motion, therefore reducing their cleaning efficacy.  Helix's continuous circular motion guarantee positive displacement.  Bristle Tip Displacement Article

Over brushing protection: over brushing is the 2nd largest cause of gum recession. Helix's Haptic Overbrushing Feedback Protection warn the user when too much pressure is about to be applied.

Gentle: There have been complaints of people becoming nauseous during use of power toothbrushes that vibrate.  Helix’s circular motion not only does a great job cleaning, but also saves energy.

Easy to recharge: Helix is the only toothbrush that can be directly charged from any USB port.  And one charge lasts 30 days.

Tongue cleaner: The tongue is a huge harbor of microorganisms.  The Helix has dedicated tongue cleaners that break up and break loose the colonies on your tongue.

Water resistant: Many electric toothbrushes fail when water enters the internal mechanism.  Helix is water resistant.

Timer: Helix has 2-minute timer to ensure sufficient cleaning time is achieved.



Manufacturing and Assembly:
The Helix pushes the envelope of manufacturing technology. Many components were vetted through dozens of companies before they could be reliably made. Some critical components have multiple backup suppliers that are ready on short-notice. We have chosen an experienced team of reputable manufacturing vendors that are working together to bring the Helix to our backers.

Shipping and Customs:
Lithium Ion Batteries are surprisingly difficult to transport quickly, and shipments sometimes get delayed. We have sourced multiple reliable carriers and worked out timelines to have the Helix to be shipped by July 2015. 

Unfortunately we will be unable to ship to Germany, Italy, and Laos.

Schedule:
Late April  - Launch Indiegogo for 40 days
 
May 2015  - Fine tune of molds, jigs, fixtures, tests and SOPs
 
June 2015  - Enters pilot run and advance to mass production
  (Manufacturing, Receiving Inspection and Assembly)
 
July  2015  - Packaging and Shipping

story:
We have our new Neeuro Online Shop found here:

 > Neeuro Online Shop <





We exercise to keep ourselves physically fit and healthy, to reduce the risk of diseases like heart attacks and strokes. We are able to do the same for our brains. 

Neeuro's solution is a combination of a mobile application containing games and a headband that monitors brainwaves. These games, designed by neuroscientists, game developers and data scientists, are played to stimulate and strengthen the mind.

The mobile application Neeuro Memorie, which works on both tablets and mobile phones, paired with the headband Neeuro SenzeBand, creates a unique combination that effectively measures brain activities for mind stimulation. This combination helps in the following cognitive functions:





Although there are some controversy about the "brain training" applications out there, science has proven that you are able to increase your "fluid intelligence" that can help you be faster and smarter in solving new problems. Think about how Sherlock Holmes solves crimes! 

Bestselling author Barbara Bradley Hagerty, who wrote the article, Forget About It: Your Middle-Aged Brain is Not on the Decline, discusses her 75% improvement in fluid intelligence after one month of a brain training game called n-back conducted by researchers at the University of Maryland.


She concludes that the middle-aged brain can still get smarter with new and challenging tasks.


The Neeuro SenzeBand, a sleek, easy-to-use wearable, paired with games designed by neuroscientists, does just that from the comfort of your home.

Our equivalent game is called Sushi Recall that engages players in a fun way to think faster and improve memory and attention, which is our fluid intelligence.


This animation gives you a peek into the science behind brain training:

Studies have shown that our brain's performance peaks in the early 20s and the decline begins towards the late 20s. This decline is linear as we advance in age beyond our twenties. With proper brain training, this decline can be delayed, thereby improving cognitive performance.


"Mental workouts aren't new, but this device lets you understand the effects of these exercises." - Tech In Asia

"Step aside, Jean Grey and Professor X. Neeuro's Brainwave Headgear can also read minds, but to check on your mental health." - e27

"This invention could potentially pave the way for scientist to gain more insights about our brain while at the same time, helps us keep a healthy mind.  There isn't an invention quite like this..." - Tech Storm

"...kids and parents will be using Neeuro to monitor and exercise their wellness, and individual users will be able to identify which cognitive functions they will need to pay more attention to." - Vulcan Post


Recent Quotes from Backers and Media from over 48 Countries:


"I wanted something to help me with my memory for my job... I've tried other games but after awhile I can't tell if it's working... this is something unique and different... I think you have a winner!" - Executive, Beta Tester


"My (10 year old) son loves playing these games... it helps him focus better... I would love for him to play more of these games and can't wait for the band!" - Parent, Beta Tester


"One of the 34 startups... that caught our eye... Neeuro has developed a headband that can read your brainwaves. It’s called the Neeuro Senzeband and it’s basically a Fitbit for your mind." -Tech In Asia


"Neeuro takes computer-based brain games a step further... Of course, that's it, I'm convinced. EUREKA!" - Urban Wearables


"...Perform at peak capacity... Be the smartest guy in the room and keep your brain in tip-top shape with Neeuro..." - InStash.com


"Neeuro can help your brain use a bit of training to stay sharp." - Gadgetify

"...I’m currently using Elevate, a brain training app... Agree that mental workload (using the SenzeBand) could be a superior measurement metric..." - Terence Lee, Editor, Tech In Asia

 




Neeuro Memorie uses games to stimulate the brain’s cognitive function in the areas of attention, decision making, memory, multitasking and spatial skills. These games are designed based on neuroscience to ensure focus on the specific cognitive skills.

By playing fun games, the EEG-based Neeuro SenzeBand reads your brain waves and tracks your progress, gives feedback for improvement. With the Neeuro SenzeBand, too, you can control the games with your thoughts, giving it a mind-controlling feature not present with other headbands and training game apps.

Neeuro helps you get back to the basics of mind wellness, and giving you the ultimate brain training experience.

Unlike most brain training applications, Neeuro Memorie uses an EEG headband, called Neeuro SenzeBand, to monitor brain activities during game play. The Neeuro SenzeBand measures brain activities for proper brain stimulation.

Simply put on Neeuro SenzeBand, pair it up with Memorie and start playing the games. Play it yourself, with children, parents, grandparents and all your loved ones; or enjoy it as a family.

For an effective brain training, spend a minimum of 15 minutes a day playing the games. Over time you will see an improvement in your cognitive performance. 

Track your performance in the games and understand your overall cognition in the areas of Memory, Attention, Spatial Skills, Multitasking and Decision Making. 

Children too, can play the cognitive games that are designed to be fun and entertaining.  They will be stimulating their minds and giving themselves all the opportunities to enhance their cognitive abilities.

Neeuro Memorie will have 15 games when released. This video highlights 5 games:


On top of that, there will also be games that require you to use your attention in order to control the games!
The MindCopter game trains you in attention and focus.  You have to concentrate and pay attention to enable the helicopter to fly.
The Psychic Cyclist game makes you practice to stay focused, so you can control the bicycle moving forward.



 




A perfect companion to the Neeuro SenzeBand, this sleek casing can hold the headband for safe keeping and travel. Stylish yet practical.

Designed specially for the Neeuro SenzeBand and all the accessories, this will give your peace of mind when you keep your headband whether for daily use or otherwise.

Get the Neeuro SenzeBand case, by adding the Casing Perk for it. 



During game play, Neeuro Memorie continuously measures and evaluates your performance through the Neeuro Learning Matrix (NLM). This is a key differentiation of Neeuro’s Memorie.

The patent pending system and method, NLM, provides a concise analysis for behavioural and mental stages while training your brain with the Neeuro Memorie games.

Find out more information about the NLM here.



We set out to change the way people perceive using wearable technology that incorporates measuring brainwaves. We wanted a brain training solution that is easy, accessible and affordable for everyone. The following table shows comparisons with other brain training alternatives:






Our world's population is ageing fast. According to the United Nations, global population aged 60 and above is growing at a faster rate than the total population. With an ageing population it will come with mental challenges like dementia. In fact, it is estimated that 46.8 million people worldwide currently have dementia and is set to double every 20 years, reaching 74.7 million by 2030. The estimated cost of dementia is US$818 billion in 2015.

Neeuro strongly believes that early diagnosis and early intervention are key mechanisms that can close this treatment gap. It's always better to seek preventive methods rather than to find a cure. 
   
At Neeuro, we want to be part of this solution towards addressing this challenge, as with many nations addressing an ageing population under Smart Nation and Smart City initiatives. At the same time, we want to reach out and provide our solution to as many people as possible.

Neeuro is a social enterprise and a member of Singapore Centre for Social Enterprise “raiSE”. Neeuro’s mind stimulation solution has a social mission as the company resolves to aid seniors, care centers, communities and health service providers with brain training.

Neeuro has done all its research and have spent over 2 years creating this mind stimulation solution. We would like to reach out to users to help make it even better. With more users, we will be able to do much more, push its accuracy even further and discover even more with what we can do with our minds. 

The Neeuro SenzeBand and Neeuro Memorie will retail for US$299 and US$149 respectively. For this campaign, we want you to be part of what we do and support our cause. In doing so, especially for this period, we will give the Neeuro SenzeBand for FREE.





We have assembled an incredible team of people, consisting of designers, engineers, neuroscientists, industry experts, marketeers and PR practitioners that all have a common vision to create the best product for mind stimulation.



We have been working on Neeuro products for the past two years, we have done various prototypes and tests. Now, we have finalised our working prototypes and we currently are in the final stages of:

  • Finalising the detailed engineering schematics for the final product.
  • Iterating on the user experience of the mobile application.
  • Developing and iterating more games so that users will have continual upgrades to new games.
We will begin the process of:
  • Designing the packaging.
  • Preparing to get product certifications.
  • Planning out the supply chain process to ensure the materials are ready for production.
  • Tooling. 
  • Procuring materials.
  • Production.

We've come a long way since we had a vision for Neeuro when it was founded in 2013.  It had been a journey of discovery, fact finding, facing different challenges and iterating our designs and methodologies until we got them right. But now we need your help. Your support will allow us to go to the next phase of our project that will help kick start the manufacturing process.  

We want to make Neeuro Memorie and Neeuro SenzeBand available to you and everyone who wants to start having healthier minds through brain training. Allowing you and your loved ones to keep their minds active, understand their cognitive performance and head towards a healthier mind. Let's make this project a success so that we can give back to communities, helping us, as a social enterprise  support those that need help with their mental well being. Let's do this together! 

Why support us?

  • Be the first to get it!
  • You've always wanted to help yourself or your loved ones improve their cognitive functions.
  • You always wanted a product that can measure your brainwaves and use them in a meaningful manner to enhance your cognition.
  • Help us to give back to communities that need help on mental well being.



  


1. PRODUCT (What it is, what is it made out of)
2. SCIENCE (What is the science, how long to play, who is it for)
3. PURCHASE & SETUP (Quantity, options, set up, etc)
4. BUYING & SHIPPING (Languages, timeline)

5. TECHNICAL (Minimum requirements, can I use it for this)

6. PRIVACY & SECURITY (Secured data, secured brainwave data)

7. OTHER QUESTIONS


1. PRODUCT

1a: How will the Neeuro SenzeBand and Neeuro Memorie App help me?

It is a brain training solution that works together; regular use of which will enhance your attention, decision making, memory, multitasking and spatial skills.

1b. How does the Neeuro SenzeBand work? Is it safe?

With its four front EEG sensors and two reference sensor electrodes, the headband accurately reads the brain's cognitive signals. The sensors use highly conductive elastomers, which capture very low frequency signals. When the headband is placed around your forehead, it records your brain's activity and senses its overall health. It is non-intrusive and safe to use, with no current or electromagnetic waves that will be sent into your brain. The Neeuro Senzeband has been internationally certified with FCC, IC and CE.

1c. What is EEG and how does it work?

Electroencephalogram, or EEG, records the brain's electrical activity, through electrodes attached outside of the head, which then transforms the electrical activity into patterns, called brain waves. Read more here.

1d. Is there scientific basis for EEG (electroencephalogram)?

Yes. An EEG test is done to check brain activity and diagnose problems in the brain or in the nervous system. Read more on Wikipedia.

1e. What is the Neeuro Memorie App?

It is a game app best used with the Neeuro SenzeBand. It contains 15 games plus regular new games to be introduced, which are designed to train different aspects of the brain's cognitive functions - attention, memory, multitasking, spatial and decision-making skills. Memorie evaluates your performance, and guides you through the lively games to achieve the desired results. Read more here.

1f. Why is the Neeuro Memorie App not free like in most wearable devices?

This is the paid version of the app that comes along with the Neeuro SenzeBand. It will contain 15 games as a start and more games will be released regularly. You will be enjoying continual upgrades and frequent new games with this package.


2. SCIENCE

2a. What is the science behind this? How do I know if this works?

Research in this field is on-going and there have been positive results based on certain conditions. We are in the midst of doing our own studies and have compiled a science whitepaper and an animated science explainer video for easy understanding. View them here.

Training for a few hours across a wide variety of brain functions like in some studies, would most likely not gain any real-world benefits in the same way as going to the gym a couple of times per month and doing undirected exercises. It has to be targeted and consistently done.

2b. How often do I need to play the games to see an improvement?

Based on existing research such as the Nature publication [PDF] in 2013, we recommend play to be at least 15-20 minutes per day.

2c: Who is this suitable for?

We want a solution that is suitable for as wide an audience as possible starting from 6 years onwards. If someone already has cognitive decline or a brain condition, we recommend that you consult your doctor first. Just like exercising in a gym will not guarantee that you will not get a heart attack, we cannot claim that using our solution will guarantee that you will not experience cognitive decline or brain diseases.


3. PURCHASE & SETUP

3a: Do I need one headband for each person in my family? Or is this sharable?

The Neeuro SenzeBand is sharable, but there will be no individual scores for you to track and thus the analytics for that account will not be useful. This is not ideal if you want to have own tracking of performance. We recommend that you consider backing the Neeuro Duo or Neeuro Family perks if you want to have more than one person use it.

3b: What colors does this come in?

We currently only have a white version. However, we would love to hear your feedback on other colors you would prefer, so email us at support@neeuro.com to let us know! 

3c: How easily can I set this up?

You need to download and install Neeuro Memorie when it’s released. Then go to the settings option in the app and click “Device”. Make sure Bluetooth is enabled on your device. Pair the app with the Neeuro SenzeBand by clicking the “Add Device” button. Once it’s connected, you’re ready to go play the games!

3d: What if I have any troubles with my product or software?

If you face any issues with the product or software, please reach out to us at: support@neeuro.com

3e: How do I know if the Neeuro SenzeBand can fit on my head comfortably?

The headband can be extended to different sizes. You can adjust it by pulling out the band that goes over your forehead until the reference hook fits comfortably at the back of your ears. Make sure the electrodes are placed at the centre of your forehead. It will fit head sizes with a circumference between 20 to 24 inches (51 to 61 cm).


4. BUYING & SHIPPING

4a: What other languages is this available in?

Neeuro Memorie is currently only in English. We plan to include other languages as we upgrade including the following languages:Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Korean and Japanese.

4b: When will this be delivered by?

We estimate to be able to manufacture and deliver this to you by June 2016.


5. TECHNICAL

5a: How will the Neeuro SenzeBand communicate with the Neeuro Memorie app?

The Neeuro SenzeBand and Neeuro Memorie app communicate via Bluetooth.

5b: What is the minimum mobile device requirement for this to work?

It can be used by most Apple iOS and Android devices that support BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy).

Mobile phone models such as:

Apple: iPhone 4s and Higher, iOS 8 and above

Samsung S4 and Note II and Higher, running Android OS Lollipop 5.0 and above

XiaoMi Mi 2 and above,  running Android OS Lollipop 5.0 and above

Tablet models such as:

iPad 3rd Gen, 4th Gen, iPad Mini, Mini 2, Mini 3, Air, Air 2 and higher,  iOS 8 and Higher

Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 and Note 10.1 and higher,  running Android OS Lollipop 5.0 and above

XiaoMi Mi Pad and above,  running Android OS Lollipop 5.0 and above

5c: Can I use the Neeuro SenzeBand to fly a drone or move something with my mind?

Technically this is possible as we have done so in our internal testing to control robots. However, we want to first release a simple, affordable and fun product to help in brain training for a healthier mind. We are open to hear from you if you have any ideas or uses that you would like to see being supported by our platform. Please tell us about it by sending an email to support@neeuro.com.

5d: Is there a SDK or API for this?

Currently no. We plan to release a SDK in the future and would love to hear from you if you’re interested. Please drop us a message at support@neeuro.com to let us know.


6. PRIVACY & SECURITY

6a: Is my personal data secured?

Yes. Neeuro takes the privacy of users’ data very seriously. Our Privacy Policy can be found at http://www.neeuro.com/privacy/


7. OTHER QUESTIONS

7a: What are the challenges?

We are creating something that uses sophisticated parts and materials, combined with designing games based on neuroscience so that as many people as possible will be able to enjoy and benefit from this.

There may be development and manufacturing delays outside of our control, but we promise you timely and transparent communications throughout the process. We have done as much as possible to reduce these risks so that we will be able to deliver this to you as soon as we can.

We exercise to keep ourselves physically fit and healthy, to reduce the risk of diseases like heart attacks and strokes. We are able to do the same for our brains. 
Neeuro's solution is a combination of a mobile application containing games and a headband that monitors brainwaves. These games, designed by neuroscientists, game developers and data scientists, are played to stimulate and strengthen the mind.






The mobile application Neeuro Memorie, which works on both tablets and mobile phones, paired with the headband Neeuro SenzeBand, creates a unique combination that effectively measures brain activities for mind stimulation. This combination helps in the following cognitive functions:






  






Although there are some controversy about the "brain training" applications out there, science has proven that you are able to increase your "fluid intelligence" that can help you be faster and smarter in solving new problems. Think about how Sherlock Holmes solves crimes! 



Bestselling author Barbara Bradley Hagerty, who wrote the article, Forget About It: Your Middle-Aged Brain is Not on the Decline, discusses her 75% improvement in fluid intelligence after one month of a brain training game called n-back conducted by researchers at the University of Maryland.

She concludes that the middle-aged brain can still get smarter with new and challenging tasks.

The Neeuro SenzeBand, a sleek, easy-to-use wearable, paired with games designed by neuroscientists, does just that from the comfort of your home.
Our equivalent game is called Sushi Recall that engages players in a fun way to think faster and improve memory and attention, which is our fluid intelligence.



This animation gives you a peek into the science behind brain training:






Studies have shown that our brain's performance peaks in the early 20s and the decline begins towards the late 20s. This decline is linear as we advance in age beyond our twenties. With proper brain training, this decline can be delayed, thereby improving cognitive performance.

"Step aside, Jean Grey and Professor X. Neeuro's Brainwave Headgear can also read minds, but to check on your mental health." - e27

7. OTHER QUESTIONS
7a: What are the challenges?

We are creating something that uses sophisticated parts and materials, combined with designing games based on neuroscience so that as many people as possible will be able to enjoy and benefit from this.There may be development and manufacturing delays outside of our control, but we promise you timely and transparent communications throughout the process. We have done as much as possible to reduce these risks so that we will be able to deliver this to you as soon as we can.

story:
Introducing WIWE

WIWE is a pocket device that is thin, easy-to-use and evaluates your ECG to detect serious medical conditions as well as helps you live a healthier life. It works either with smartphones or tablets.

  1. Easy to use: and easy to wear. It only takes 60 seconds to record your ECG and it’s the same size as a business card holder.
  2. It does it all: you can take ownership of your health with it’s built in functions like the pedometer, pulse oximeter and calorie counter.
  3. Prevention: at it’s best. Our main goal is to ask people to take care of their heart and body before it’s too late.
  4. Real time capturing: of your ECG and evaluating the risks of a sudden cardiac arrest and afib-related stroke.

About Stroke and Sudden Cardiac Arrest:

  • According to WHO (World Health Organization) 15 million people suffer from a stroke wolrdwide each year.
  • Out of them 5 million die and other 5 million becomes permanently disabled.
  • CVD (Cardiovascular Disease, a class of diseases that involve the heart or blood vessels) is the leading cause of global mortality, accounting for almost 17 million deaths annually (30 % of all global mortality).
  • 40-50 % of these are Sudden Cardiac Death (SCD) and 80 % of these are Ventricular Fibrillation/Tachycardia (VF/VT)

Who is WIWE for?

For Managers: 

Stressful days, working late and having less and less time. WIWE only takes a minute to take care of your health and it tells you if there is something you should deal with now.
For Athletes:

Just going forward, keep getting better and better and no time for stopping or letting loose. You can use WIWE anytime, anywhere to make sure, that your heart keeps up with you.

For Seniors:

As we grow older so do the risks of Heart Diseases. With WIWE it's easy for anybody to check if everything is fine.

People taking care of the elderly:

Taking care of our elderly even if we can't be with them. With a built-in option to share it's easy to see our parents’ recordings from afar.

Health-conscious people:

WIWE shows us that we did enough for our body at the end of each day. Tracking how many calories you burn and how many steps you take has never been so easy.

Caring mothers:

Knowing that we can take care of our children for a long time still. Because WIWE helps us to prevent serious Heart Diseases.

Our goal was to design a device that anybody can easily use. We intend to give a product that is available to everyone and which helps in the prevention of life threatening diseases like Sudden Cardiac Arrest (SCA) and Afib-related Stroke.

What we created helps to give people confidence that their heart is in good condition so they don’t have to worry about it.

How it works?

The WIWE system consists of two parts:  

  • The WIWE device  
  • WIWE application

WIWE’s main function is recoding ECG, the electrical activity of the heart over a period of time. For this it uses the first limb lead (Lead I), meaning that the device evaluates the voltage between the left arm (positive electrode) and the right arm (negative electrode).

The time period for recording in the case of WIWE is 60 seconds. That’s around 60 cardiac cycles for a person in a calm environment.

The WIWE device

Is a cardiological diagnostic device. Its priority is evaluating the risk of Atrial Fibrillation and if there is a change in Ventricular Heterogenity. For this we use a unique and worldwide new method.  

You can also measure your Blood Oxygen Level and Heart Rate when you record your ECG.

On top of these we wanted WIWE to also function as a pedometer. You can record the steps you take, the calories you burn and there are exciting badges and milestones waiting for you.

Recording with WIWE is as easy as 1-2-3:


  • Put and keep your 2 fingertips on the electrodes  
  • Wait 60 seconds until the app says you can release  
  • Look through the evaluation screen presented to you

Important details of the evaluation:  

Ventricular Heterogenity (VH):  

  • WIWE analyzes the ingerated value of the QRST 
  • If these differ in the cardiac cycles, then there is a change in Ventricular Heterogenity

Atrial Fibrillation (AF):

  • It makes a Poincaré graph based on the R to R intervals  
  • Evaluates the variability of the length of intervals

The WIWE application

We wanted to put as much as we can into the application, yet keep it easy to use.

Evaluation screen:

  • ECG (ElectroCardioGraphy) button shows, if there is any abnormality in the majority ECG waveform  
  • AF (Atrial Fibrillation) button shows, if there is a risk for Afib-related Stroke
  • VH (Ventricular Heterogenity) button shows, if there is a risk for Sudden Cardiac Arrest (SCA)
  • Under these you can find your Blood Oxygen Level (SpO2) and Heart Rate (Bpm)

The WIWE device also functions as a pedometer:

  • Recording the steps you take  
  • Counting the calories you burned
  • WIWE has graphs and statistics about your activity

  • And there are interesting milestones for motivation

Please note for this to work the most precise way, detailed personal information are available under your user profile (Weight, Height, Age, etc.).

How we got here

Professor George Kozmann

The idea itself came from a famous Hungarian scientist, George Kozmann, professor (University of Pannonia), head of the Centre for Medical Informatics Research & Development, Faculty of Information Technology, Veszprém and his assistant, Gregory Tuboly (University of Pannonia, Faculty of Information Technology, Department of Electrical Engineering and Information Systems).

Gregory Tuboly

They wanted to create something, that could be efficent in preventing Sudden Cardiac Arrest and Afib-related Stroke. For this they needed a risk calculation algorithm which can evaluate if there is a risk for Atrial Fibrillation or change in the Ventricular Heterogenity. After this came the idea to use not 12 Lead just One Bipolar lead for measuring the above stated risks and using a phone for checking the results of the recordings. This was the basic concept of WIWE. The part of Gregory in the project is the development of the WIWE ECG/SpO2 signal processing and evaluating modules and the testing of the applied atrial fibrillation detection algorithm on reference ECG signals.

He said: „We tried for a long time in both Hardware and Software to make something that is capable of everything we wanted”.


„As we are starting to reach our goal the final concept is becoming clearer and clearer, although there were many prototypes on the way.”

We are working hard on both the software and hardware to solve every issue, but now we need your help!


Timeline

Team

These are the people behind WIWE. They are the ones who are making it possible to bring this complex, yet easy to use home device to You. Engineers, Designers, Software developers, Marketing managers, PR managers and everyone from this team worked and still working very hard to reach the goal of making the Perfect Product.

Rewards

3 $ - A Big Thank You for your support!  

 You will get exclusive updates on our progress via e-mail.

149 $ - Super Early Bird - White color / Save 40% Off the 250 $ retail price!

Be one of the first to get your own WIWE!

On top of this you’ll get a Social Shoutout on our Facebook page for being one of the first to pledge.

159 $ - Super Early Bird - Black color / Save 40% Off the 250 $ retail price!

Be one of the first to get your own WIWE!

On top of this you’ll get a Social Shoutout on our Facebook page for being one of the first to pledge.

289 $ - Family Pack - White color / Save 40% Off the 250 $ retail price!

One WIWE for you and one for your loved ones at the Super Early Bird price!

309 $ - Family Pack - Black color / Save 40% Off the 250 $ retail price!

One WIWE for you and one for your loved ones at the Super Early Bird price!

999 $ - Design Your Own WIWE

Design your own, unique WIWE, choose any color you like!
On top of that you’ll get your name put on your own WIWE and the Case - of your choice - you’ll get with it!
Types of cases include Standing, Lying or Universal Slim or even an Armband Case. 

Technical information

WIWE is a small (87,5 x 54 x 5,5 mm) and compact device.

Its about the size of a business card holder.

WIWE is also lightweight, it weighs about 40 g (cc. 1,4 ounce).

We need you

Our goal is to provide a WIWE to everyone so they can check their risk for Afib-related Stroke and Sudden Cardiac Arrest.

Because: If you know it, you can change it!

That’s why we need your help!

Please like us on Facebook

https://www.facebook.com/wiweforhealth

Please follow us on Twitter

https://twitter.com/wiweforhealth

Pleace chek out our website, there are a lot more useful information about WIWE on it

http://mywiwe.com/en/

Risks and challenges

With a product this complex we’ve had a couple of setbacks but we managed to get over them.

As of now we’ve got challenges on 3 major fronts.

Manufacturing

We are now producing fully working prototypes for clinical testing and after that we need to prepare for mass production.

Software

Our programmers are giving their best for the software to be 100 % working. 
As of now we’re looking at approximately 95 % concerning the recording and evaluation of the cardiac cycles.

Logistics

We'll receive our CE mark in March and we're working hard to get our FDA clearance in September. 
Our goal is to be able to give a WIWE to anyone, anywhere!

story:
Meet Earmo , the Evolutionary Baby Gear of Wellbeing.

The sign that parents let out when they find heat on their child leads to an overwhelming thought of taking care of a sick baby. Designed by a dad for all anxious parents who struggle with child's fever, Earmo wants to help you get your child recover as quickly and easily as possible. Earmo help you read accurate temperatures in 1 second. Adorable emoticons according to temperature readings set you and your baby at ease. It's also readable at night so no more fiddling with a smartphone light to see the temperature readings in the dark. 

1 Second For Results = 1 Less Fussy Baby

Meet Earmo, a completely upgraded experience from your old thermometers. It only takes 1 sec to get a reading instead of 3 mins, and you can view past results and current results clearly on its large LED display. Embedded with a highly sensitive infrared temperature sensor, Earmo enhances the response and has an accuracy of ±0.4℉ / ±0.2℃.

Easy to View at Night

With Earmo’s intuitive screen automatically lighting up in a dim environment, you don’t have to wake your sick baby up and cause them to cry at night. Woo-hoo. Another peaceful night towards full recovery.

Swipe to Compare with Previous Temps

You have already measured the baby’s temperature five times in an hour to make sure if the temperature is dropping. If you have more than one child, most likely you'll forget a temperature even if you took it 5 minutes ago. Earmo displays up to 5 readings. A swipe on the LED touchscreen reveals one temperature at a time.

Get Suggestions to Combat Fever

It's hard to find a doctor willing to take a call at 3 in the morning, and going through tons of articles on Google isn't exactly your best option. With our Earmo app, you can get instant tips on what you should do next to help your baby. 

Another cool feature: You can share all the baby's recovery progress to your doctor immediately via text messaging or email.  

Safe, Hygienic, and Saves Your Money

No lens filters are needed equals to No More “I run out of lens filters” or “I need to go to CVS to get extra filters” moments. It’s easy to disinfect with just an alcohol wipe. Without an invasive probe tip and lens filters, Earmo’s ABS plastic probe works as gentle and safe as possible to make taking temperatures easier than before. The probe tip is also smaller so it fits in the baby’s ears without too much ear pulling.

Smiley Emoticons for Encouragement

Taking care of your baby when they're sick is stressful. The high-temperature numbers can be scary, and we want to give some positive reinforcement. It's a great feeling when that frowny face turns into a happy one! 

Enhance Your Entire Family’s Wellness

From kids to adults, Earmo can be used for tracking all your family’s health status and having health suggestions ready. If you have more than one child, you can separate every reading on the app, so it doesn't get mixed up. That way you can monitor every child's health.

 

Adam Lou, CEO of Bongmi, plays with his son. Courtesy of Bongmi.

When his wife was pregnant a year ago, Adam Lou, the CEO of Bongmi, wanted a thermometer that was accurate, safe, fast, and would not disturb his sick or sleepy son while taking temperatures. After a year of hard work, Earmo has arrived. With a shape of jade, Earmo draws comfort from its gentle surface when you hold it. Earmo’s revolutionary interface, which allows you to read previous temperature on the surface of the thermometer, brings the best user experiences in both the product and application.

Earmo is built with kids in mind. Just like Adam designs Earmo from his care for his upcoming baby, Earmo wants to bring the fast and accurate measurements to you and your beloved children with your supports.

Amy from Baby League, a YouTube hub of mommy Bloggers with 443,162 subscribers, shares her helpful hacks, including Earmo, taking care of sick kids. Let’s watch how Earmo becomes a game-changer for moms to manage children’s health.

 

The method of temperature reading – on a LED glass screen - has not changed since the first electronic clinical thermometer was invented in 1954. Even on so-called “smart” ear thermometers.

We believe that the word smart in the ear thermometer industry calls for a revolutionary design that gives you a peace of mind. Earmo was designed to address your need for easy, accurate and convenient temperature reading without missing one tiny change on the thermometer.

No need to take notes on your little one’s temperature. No need to wait your thermometer-compatible app receives the readings via Bluetooth. No need to guess if the temperature is declining. By swiping on the LED Screen, Earmo reads the past 5 sets of temperature instantly. 

We are Bongmi, the creator of Femometer, a smart fertility tracker. We launched Femometer Indiegogo campaign last year and raised $92, 730, which is over 240% funded. Thanks to our supporting community of backers, we continue evolving technologies to enhance wellness for every family. We are proud to be back and bring Earmo to help you take care of your beloved children and the whole family.  

FAQ

 

What is Earmo?

It’s the first accurate and smart ear thermometer with a LED touchscreen LED.

How do I use Earmo?

For first time use, press the button and swipe left/right on the screen to set and confirm temperature unit ℃/℉. Gently pull ear back, insert Earmo and press the button. After single beep sound, the result will be available on the screen. Swipe up/down to see 5 sets of temperature recordings. Connect with Earmo app to get more information.

How does Earmo work?

We know Earmo measures ear temperature. But why? Hypothalamus is the central pivot of body temperature adjustment, and it’s closest to eardrum. The eardrum reacts fast to any body temperature changes. Thus, measuring the temperature of eardrum is the most accurate and fast way to acquire temperature data. After the thermopile sensor on the plastic tip receives infrared, it creates voltage signal and transfers into digital signal which correlates with oral temperature. It’s fast and accurate.

Is Earmo accurate?

Equipped with high-precision thermopile sensor, Earmo has the accuracy of 0.2℃/0.4℉. It can reflect tiny changes in body temperature.

What’s in the box?

1*Earmo

1*Quick start guide

1*Probe Protector

2*AAA Battery

What is the uniqueness of Earmo?

Earmo is the very first ear thermometer with a LED touchscreen.

What features are available with Earmo?

- Accurate temperature measurement

- Instant temperature readings

- Touchable LED screen

- Intelligent complimentary app

- Ergonomic handle with streamlined curve

What material is Earmo made of?

Earmo is made of durable ABS plastic.

Does Earmo support Bluetooth connectivity?

Yes. Earmo has a low-energy Bluetooth chip inside which automatically connects with your phone and syncs data.

Can I share my data?

Yes, you can share data with your family and doctor via email and text message.

How is Earmo powered?

Earmo is powered via 2 AAA batteries which can be easily purchased at your local store.

What phones and devices work with Earmo?

Earmo can work with both iOS and Android to provide comprehensive temperature readings.

When wiIl Earmo start to ship?

We will begin to ship from June, 2017.

Where does Earmo ship to?

The shipping cost will vary by perk. You can check the details in the following chart.

If I have other questions, who should I contact?

We are receiving a lot of inquiries, and are responding as fast as possible. Please contact support@bongmi.com with any questions you may have. We’re excited to hear from you.
story_txt:
Meet Earmo , the Evolutionary Baby Gear of Wellbeing.The sign that parents let out when they find heat on their child leads to an overwhelming thought of taking care of a sick baby. Designed by a dad for all anxious parents who struggle with child's fever, Earmo wants to help you get your child recover as quickly and easily as possible. Earmo help you read accurate temperatures in 1 second. Adorable emoticons according to temperature readings set you and your baby at ease. It's also readable at night so no more fiddling with a smartphone light to see the temperature readings in the dark. 1 Second For Results = 1 Less Fussy BabyMeet Earmo, a completely upgraded experience from your old thermometers. It only takes 1 sec to get a reading instead of 3 mins, and you can view past results and current results clearly on its large LED display. Embedded with a highly sensitive infrared temperature sensor, Earmo enhances the response and has an accuracy of ±0.4℉ / ±0.2℃.Easy to View at Night
With Earmo’s intuitive screen automatically lighting up in a dim environment, you don’t have to wake your sick baby up and cause them to cry at night. Woo-hoo. Another peaceful night towards full recovery.Swipe to Compare with Previous Temps
You have already measured the baby’s temperature five times in an hour to make sure if the temperature is dropping. If you have more than one child, most likely you'll forget a temperature even if you took it 5 minutes ago. Earmo displays up to 5 readings. A swipe on the LED touchscreen reveals one temperature at a time.Get Suggestions to Combat FeverIt's hard to find a doctor willing to take a call at 3 in the morning, and going through tons of articles on Google isn't exactly your best option. With our Earmo app, you can get instant tips on what you should do next to help your baby. Another cool feature: You can share all the baby's recovery progress to your doctor immediately via text messaging or email.  Safe, Hygienic, and Saves Your MoneyNo lens filters are needed equals to No More “I run out of lens filters” or “I need to go to CVS to get extra filters” moments. It’s easy to disinfect with just an alcohol wipe. Without an invasive probe tip and lens filters, Earmo’s ABS plastic probe works as gentle and safe as possible to make taking temperatures easier than before. The probe tip is also smaller so it fits in the baby’s ears without too much ear pulling.Smiley Emoticons for EncouragementTaking care of your baby when they're sick is stressful. The high-temperature numbers can be scary, and we want to give some positive reinforcement. It's a great feeling when that frowny face turns into a happy one! Enhance Your Entire Family’s WellnessFrom kids to adults, Earmo can be used for tracking all your family’s health status and having health suggestions ready. If you have more than one child, you can separate every reading on the app, so it doesn't get mixed up. That way you can monitor every child's health. Adam Lou, CEO of Bongmi, plays with his son. Courtesy of Bongmi.When his wife was pregnant a year ago, Adam Lou, the CEO of Bongmi, wanted a thermometer that was accurate, safe, fast, and would not disturb his sick or sleepy son while taking temperatures. After a year of hard work, Earmo has arrived. With a shape of jade, Earmo draws comfort from its gentle surface when you hold it. Earmo’s revolutionary interface, which allows you to read previous temperature on the surface of the thermometer, brings the best user experiences in both the product and application.Earmo is built with kids in mind. Just like Adam designs Earmo from his care for his upcoming baby, Earmo wants to bring the fast and accurate measurements to you and your beloved children with your supports.Amy from Baby League, a YouTube hub of mommy Bloggers with 443,162 subscribers, shares her helpful hacks, including Earmo, taking care of sick kids. Let’s watch how Earmo becomes a game-changer for moms to manage children’s health.  The method of temperature reading – on a LED glass screen - has not changed since the first electronic clinical thermometer was invented in 1954. Even on so-called “smart” ear thermometers.We believe that the word smart in the ear thermometer industry calls for a revolutionary design that gives you a peace of mind. Earmo was designed to address your need for easy, accurate and convenient temperature reading without missing one tiny change on the thermometer.No need to take notes on your little one’s temperature. No need to wait your thermometer-compatible app receives the readings via Bluetooth. No need to guess if the temperature is declining. By swiping on the LED Screen, Earmo reads the past 5 sets of temperature instantly. We are Bongmi, the creator of Femometer, a smart fertility tracker. We launched Femometer Indiegogo campaign last year and raised $92, 730, which is over 240% funded. Thanks to our supporting community of backers, we continue evolving technologies to enhance wellness for every family. We are proud to be back and bring Earmo to help you take care of your beloved children and the whole family.  FAQ What is Earmo?It’s the first accurate and smart ear thermometer with a LED touchscreen LED.How do I use Earmo?For first time use, press the button and swipe left/right on the screen to set and confirm temperature unit ℃/℉. Gently pull ear back, insert Earmo and press the button. After single beep sound, the result will be available on the screen. Swipe up/down to see 5 sets of temperature recordings. Connect with Earmo app to get more information.How does Earmo work?We know Earmo measures ear temperature. But why? Hypothalamus is the central pivot of body temperature adjustment, and it’s closest to eardrum. The eardrum reacts fast to any body temperature changes. Thus, measuring the temperature of eardrum is the most accurate and fast way to acquire temperature data. After the thermopile sensor on the plastic tip receives infrared, it creates voltage signal and transfers into digital signal which correlates with oral temperature. It’s fast and accurate.Is Earmo accurate?Equipped with high-precision thermopile sensor, Earmo has the accuracy of 0.2℃/0.4℉. It can reflect tiny changes in body temperature.What’s in the box?1*Earmo1*Quick start guide1*Probe Protector2*AAA BatteryWhat is the uniqueness of Earmo?Earmo is the very first ear thermometer with a LED touchscreen.What features are available with Earmo?- Accurate temperature measurement- Instant temperature readings- Touchable LED screen- Intelligent complimentary app- Ergonomic handle with streamlined curveWhat material is Earmo made of?Earmo is made of durable ABS plastic.Does Earmo support Bluetooth connectivity?Yes. Earmo has a low-energy Bluetooth chip inside which automatically connects with your phone and syncs data.Can I share my data?Yes, you can share data with your family and doctor via email and text message.How is Earmo powered?Earmo is powered via 2 AAA batteries which can be easily purchased at your local store.What phones and devices work with Earmo?Earmo can work with both iOS and Android to provide comprehensive temperature readings.When wiIl Earmo start to ship?We will begin to ship from June, 2017.Where does Earmo ship to?The shipping cost will vary by perk. You can check the details in the following chart.If I have other questions, who should I contact?We are receiving a lot of inquiries, and are responding as fast as possible. Please contact support@bongmi.com with any questions you may have. We’re excited to hear from you.

story:
Welcome!

Our Mission

Our mission is to reduce the spread of germs and viruses from coughing and sneezing. We appreciate you joining us in our effort. Your contribution is helping in the development of this product. 

  • Imagine airborne droplets filling your home.
  • Imagine you're in an ER waiting area surrounded by sick people
  • Imagine you’re on a plane and the person next to you can’t stop coughing.
  • Imagine an office worker coughing on their computer and phone all day
  • Imagine sending your children to school healthy but they return sick because they sat around coughing classmates.

   

 

Facebook

Please take the time to share.

  • Get the word out and make some noise about what we're doing.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread our message.

Twitter

story:
Send Kelly Sarchet Nielsen to Diamond Head, Oahu

On September 28, 2014 Kelly Sarchet Nielsen was pronounced dead after having multiple heart attacks. Kelly left behind two beautiful children Jared and Allison, her loving husband Mark, two caring sisters, her wonderful mother and innumerable friends.

Kelly was a strong woman and overcame lung cancer at an early age. In 2004, Kelly was hospitalized for an unknown cause. She only had 25% chance to live, but ended up giving her family another 10 years. She and her family have overcome tremendous burdens against great odds.

Kelly wanted so bad to go to Oahu, and Mark promised they would fly over Diamond Head in a helicopter. Mark would like to keep his promise to her by taking Jared and Allison with her ashes on the tour that would have been the pinnacle moment for Kelly.

We're asking for YOUR assistance to make this happen. Please help this family keep the last promise to an amazing wife, mother and friend.

Whether or not you contribute, Kelly wants you to hear this.

story:
UPDATE: Hey guys thank you all for support this is going GREAT!! I just want to let everyone know that Franky does NOT know about this nor do I want him to know at this time due to the emotion surrounding this situation. 

 

The Tree of Life

About Me

Me in the middle with my two amazing brothers!

My name is Vanessa. I am a graduate from McMaster University in Hamilton, Ontario, where I received my Bachelor of Commerce, majoring in human resources. I have lived in Canada my entire 22 years, have a wonderful loving family, a true passion for animals and a strong desire to travel the world. I have always had an urge to start something big, something that will effect other's in a positive way and here I have found my calling.
This is where my story begins...

WHY am I doing This?

Not too long ago a close family member of mine (my cousin Franky) was diagnosed with gastric cancer (cancer of the stomach). This is a very serious type of cancer and a difficult one to fight as it is often found at a later stage due to a lack of symptoms. At the prime of his life, my cousin was planned to be married and start his life with his new bride, but plans were quickly put on hold. Plans of having the time of his life were now turned to enduring the fight of his life. Surgery was immediately scheduled at Sunnybrook Health Sciences Centre to have 2/3 of his stomach removed. He was put into the caring and skilled hands of the surgeons at Sunnybrook and thankfully his surgery was successful. But his fight had just begun with a year ahead of chemotherapy and radiation. They say when someone is struck with cancer it effects the entire family as well as friends and I was now seeing this with my own eyes. With this tragic occurrence and the fighting battle that my cousin still has to endure I found a calling within me to start something special with my cousin in my heart.

Where do the funds go?

I have chosen the Odette Cancer Center at Sunnybrook Health Sciences Centre, where a majority of the contributions of this campaign will go. If my goal is reached, I will contribute a portion of the funds to help cover medical expenses. Franky is scheduled to be off work for more than one year and unfortunately expenses are adding up as the chemotherapy treatment which he is receiving is not covered by health care. 

  Marta is another beautiful young individual who was diagnosed with stage IV stomach cancer just this year at age 30. I met her through my cousin (via internet) as he was in search of support from others who were going through the same battle as himself (its very unusual for someone so young to have gastric cancer). Marta calls herself and others facing cancer ‘warriors’ and she plans to kick cancers butt!! She has made a blog to inspire those to have strength and courage even when the odds are against them. Feel free to visit her blog page at www.diaryofaprettyface.com and her donation page to help cover her medical costs at http://www.youcaring.com/fundraiser_details?fundraiser_id=7338&url=teammarta.

 

       "Give what you have. To someone, it may be better than you dare to think."

                         - Henry Wadsworth Longfellow (1807 - 1882)

What is the Tree of Life?

The Tree of Life is my symbolic beginning to the campaign as I start to raise funds for the Odette Cancer Center. The Tree of Life defines an expression of life through a tree's growth, its trunk, its long growing branches and leaves and the various colours it goes through in each season with its connection to the Earth. I want the Tree of Life to represent growing and healing within ourselves and for it to be a reminder of how we are connected to the Earth – that we are all one and we are forever growing. This bracelet will be used to symbolize The Tree of Life and will be black in colour.

My goal is to raise $15,000 and to one day see these bracelets all across North America. When we see these bracelets we will be reminded of life, health and healing. To encourage this and promote the campaign, a number of perks will be available for everyone! Each perk has its unique offer allowing for more Tree of Life bracelets. 

          "We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give."

                                   - Sir Winston Churchill (1874 - 1965)

What YOU Get!!

This is what the silver and black Tree of life bracelet will look like.

This is a similar representation of what the Tree of Life pendant for the 'Gracious Donation' will look like!

All orders will be recieved once the campaign finishes.

Shipping to Canada and the United States is included.

Other Ways YOU Can Help

  1. For you who are unable to financially contribute, no problem! There are a few things I would appreciate you doing that could really help out my campaign!
  2. Get the word out and make some noise about the Tree of Life campaign, tell your friends and family.
  3. Use the Indiegogo share tools to help spread the word!
  4. Lastly, send any thoughts or words of wisdom, positive support or share your experiences with me as I would love to share them with those who are close to me!
  5. Now let the journey begin, with a path paved on the road, the next step is to fill the path with the love we are given and spread it to those that we love!

 

                                   

                                                   Quotes

                "Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself." 
                                              • George Bernard Shaw
  

                  "Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one
                                        alive who is Youer than You."                                                 
                                                                • Dr. Seuss
